This module was designed for 1-4 players of levels 1-7.
Text: 이 모듈은 레벨 1-7의 1-4명까지 플레이어를 위한 것입니다.

TextEng:
Caster Level(s): Wizard / Sorcerer 3
Innate Level: 3
School: Evocation
Descriptor(s): Electricity
Component(s): Verbal, Somatic
Range: Medium
Area of Effect / Target: Chain of targets in a straight line
Duration: Instant
Additional Counter Spells:
Save: Reflex 1/2
Spell Resistance: Yes

The caster fires a bolt of lightning that passes through all creatures in a straight line from the caster. The bolt does 1d6 points of electricity damage per caster level, to a maximum of 10d6.
Text:
번개 화살(Lightning bolt)
시전자 레벨: 마법사/요술사 3
기본 레벨: 3
학파: 방출술
주문 기술어: 전기
구성: 음성, 동작
사거리: 20미터
효과 범위 / 대상: 직선상의 일련의 대상
지속 시간: 즉시
추가 역주문:
내성굴림: 반사굴림 성공 시 절반
주문 저항: 가능

시전자가 직선상의 모든 생명체를 관통하는 번개의 화살을 발사하여 전기 피해를 입힙니다.
피해량: 시전자 레벨 당 1d6(최대 10d6)점의 전기 피해

TextEng:
Caster Level(s): Wizard / Sorcerer 2
Innate Level: 2
School: Conjuration
Descriptor(s): Acid
Component(s): Verbal, Somatic
Range: Long
Area of Effect / Target: Single
Duration: 1 Round, + 1 Round / 3 Levels
Additional Counter Spells:
Save: None
Spell Resistance: Yes

The caster targets a single creature with an acid bolt and must succeed at a ranged touch attack for the missile to be effective. The initial damage from the spell is 3d6, +1d6 every round until the spell expires.
Text:
멜프의 산성 화살(Melf's acid arrow)
시전자 레벨: 마법사/요술사 2
기본 레벨: 2
학파: 소환술
주문 기술어: 산성
구성: 음성, 동작
사거리: 40미터
효과 범위 / 대상: 단일
지속 시간: 1라운드 + 시전자 3레벨 당 1라운드
추가 역주문:
내성굴림: 없음
주문 저항: 가능

시전자는 산성 화살의 목표로 단일 생명체를 지정합니다. 주문은 초기에 산성 피해를 입히고 지속 시간이 끝날 때까지 매 라운드 마다 추가 산성 피해를 입니다.
초기 피해량: 3d6점의 산성 피해
지속 피해량: 1d6점의 산성 피해

TextEng:
Caster Level(s): Wizard / Sorcerer 3
Innate Level: 3
School: Conjuration
Descriptor(s): Fire
Component(s): Verbal, Somatic
Range: Medium
Area of Effect / Target: Single
Duration: Instant
Additional Counter Spells:
Save: Reflex 1/2
Spell Resistance: Yes

The caster launches 1 conjured fiery arrow at the target creature for every 4 caster levels. Each arrow does 4d6 points of damage.
Text:
불꽃 화살(Flame arrow)
시전자 레벨: 마법사/요술사 3
기본 레벨: 3
학파: 소환술
주문 기술어: 화염
구성: 음성, 동작
사거리: 20미터
효과 범위 / 대상: 단일
지속 시간: 즉시
추가 역주문:
내성굴림: 반사굴림 성공 시 절반
주문 저항: 가능

시전자가 시전자 4레벨 당 한개(최대 10개)의 불타는 화살을 소환하고 대상 생명체에게 발사하여 화염 피해를 입힙니다.
피해량: 발사체 별 4d6의 화염 피해

TextEng:
Caster Level(s): Wizard / Sorcerer 5
Innate Level: 5
School: Evocation
Descriptor(s): Cold
Component(s): Verbal, Somatic
Range: Cone, 30ft
Area of Effect / Target: Spell Cone
Duration: Instant
Additional Counter Spells:
Save: Reflex 1/2
Spell Resistance: Yes

A cone of frost and snow shoots forth from the caster's hands, doing 1d6 points of cold damage per caster level to all those within the area of effect, to a maximum of 15d6.
Text:
냉기의 원뿔(Cone of cold)
시전자 레벨: 마법사/요술사 5
기본 레벨: 5
학파: 방출술
주문 기술어: 냉기
구성: 음성, 동작
사거리: 원뿔형 10미터
효과 범위 / 대상: 원뿔형
지속 시간: 즉시
추가 역주문:
내성굴림: 반사굴림 성공 시 절반
주문 저항: 가능

시전자의 손에서 원뿔형으로 서리와 눈을 발사하여 효과 영역 내의 모두에게 냉기 피해를 입힙니다.
피해량: 시전자 레벨 당 1d6(15d6)점의 냉기 피해

TextEng: Crickets Loop NGT ONLY low volum
Wind Gust Strong short rnd time
Tomb of Nilmaldor, Knight-Gallant of Ascalhorn
North - the High Pass : South - Blumberg
East - Blumberg : West - Hilltop : South - High Forest
Text: 동 - 블럼버그 : 서 - 힐탑 : 남 - 높은 숲

TextEng: For faction purposes - do not remove me

Text: 고블린형 임의의 보물 기본 상자 모듈

TextEng: Module Animal Random Treasure Base Container
Text: 동물 임의의 보물 기본 상자 모듈

TextEng: If you're to help Master Drogan, you'll need to get underway as soon as possible. Do you need my help?
Text: If you're to help Master Drogan, you'll need to get underway as soon as possible. Do you need my help?

TextEng: Isn't it grand? We are inside one of the great flying cities. It is... like a tomb in here. A gravestone of greatness long since past.
Text: Isn't it grand? We are inside one of the great flying cities. It is... like a tomb in here. A gravestone of greatness long since past.

TextEng: You have the honor of the stones, Master Drogan. F-farewell.
Text: You have the honor of the stones, Master Drogan. F-farewell.

TextEng: Lossst? It wasss no lossss! Sssuch a sssmall sssacrifice to gain ssso much! I would have gambled everything for even a fraction of the mythal'sss power! Besidesss, my gaze hasss ssserved itsss purpossse, hasss it not? You would know...
Text: Lossst? It wasss no lossss! Sssuch a sssmall sssacrifice to gain ssso much! I would have gambled everything for even a fraction of the mythal'sss power! Besidesss, my gaze hasss ssserved itsss purpossse, hasss it not? You would know...

TextEng: Fool! Without the mythal, the city will fall!
Text: Fool! Without the mythal, the city will fall!

TextEng: We could be in some trouble, friend. The oxen have gone through the water rations much faster than expected. There is an oasis near here, but we have had some trouble with the tribe that guards it.
Text: We could be in some trouble, friend. The oxen have gone through the water rations much faster than expected. There is an oasis near here, but we have had some trouble with the tribe that guards it.

TextEng: You have a way of dealing with problems that I seem to lack. If you could just go and talk to the Bedine, maybe they would allow us to restock our water supplies.
Text: You have a way of dealing with problems that I seem to lack. If you could just go and talk to the Bedine, maybe they would allow us to restock our water supplies.

TextEng: I see you have returned. Have you gotten permission to take their water?
Text: I see you have returned. Have you gotten permission to take their water?

TextEng: The sounds of battle!  From downstairs!
Text: The sounds of battle! From downstairs!

TextEng: Master Drogan is in trouble!  Use your rings!
Text: Master Drogan is in trouble! Use your rings!

TextEng: So have you come to your senses? You need Xanos's skills, now, yes?
Text: So have you come to your senses? You need Xanos's skills, now, yes?

TextEng: You... sacrifice yourself for us? For Xanos?
Text: You... sacrifice yourself for us? For Xanos?

TextEng: You... give me too much credit, Master Drogan.
Text: You... give me too much credit, Master Drogan.

TextEng: When I'm done even the buzzards won't want you.
Text: 내가 네놈을 끝장내면 독수리도 얼씬거리지 않을걸.

TextEng: When I'm done even the buzzards won't want you.
Text: 내가 네놈을 끝장내면 독수리도 얼씬거리지 않을걸.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Item Creation
Prerequisite: Spellcaster Level  5th+.
Specifics: The spellcaster can create a wand of any spell of 4th level or lower that he knows. Crafting a wand costs a small amount of XP and gold, depending on the level of the spell to be crafted into the wand.  A newly created wand has 1d20 + 1 charge per level of the character (up to a maximum of 50 charges). The costs for crafting a wand depend on the level of the spell as well as the level of the resulting wand:
Some examples:
A wand of magic missile(5)   will costs 3750 gp and 150 XP
A wand of acid arrow (5)  will cost 7500gp and 300 XP
A wand of fireballs (5)  will cost 11250 gp and 450 XP

Use: Selected (In order to craft a wand, the character has to cast the spell in question on a specially crafted wand)
Text:
마법봉 제작(Craft wand)
재주 유형: 아이템 생성
선결 조건: 주문시전자 레벨 5이상
세부 사항: 알고있는 4레벨 이하의 주문의 마법봉을 만들 수 있습니다. 마법봉을 제작하려면 뼈 마법봉을 준비해야 하며, 작성하는 주문의 기본 레벨과 마법봉의 시전자 레벨에 기반해 약간의 경험치(XP)와 금화를 지불해야 합니다.
지불 경험치(XP): 시전자 레벨(물약) x 기본 레벨 x 750
지불 금화: 시전자 레벨(물약) x 기본 레벨 x 30
사용: 선택

TextEng: Henchmen only move between the chapters with the correct equipment, if they are currently hired by a player.
Text: 현재 플레이어가 고용한 추종자는 적합한 장비를 갖춘 상태에서만 각 장 사이를 이동 가능합니다.

TextEng:
(PRESTIGE CLASS)
The defender is a sponsored champion of a dwarven cause, a dwarven aristocrat, a dwarven deity or the dwarven way of life. As the name might imply, this character is a skilled combatant trained in the arts of defense. A line of dwarven defenders is a far better defense than a 10-foot-thick wall of stone, and much more dangerous.

- Hit Die: d12
- Proficiencies: Simple and Martial Weapons, Light, Medium and Heavy Armor Proficiency, Shields
- Skill Points: 2 + Int Modifier.

REQUIREMENTS:

Alignment: Any lawful.
Race: Dwarf
Feats: Dodge, Toughness.
Base Attack Bonus: +7

ABILITIES:

Level
1: Defensive stance 1/day  - Gain +2 Str, +4 Con, +2 on all saves, +4 dodge bonus on AC.
  Defensive awareness  - Dexterity bonus to AC even when flat-footed.
3: Defensive stance 2/day.
5: Defensive stance 3/day.
  Defensive awareness  - The character can not  be flanked anymore.
6: Damage reduction (3).
7: Defensive stance 4/day.
9: Defensive stance 5/day.
10: Damage reduction (6).
  Defensive awareness - The character gains a +1 saving throw bonus vs traps.
Text:
(상위 직업)
드워프 수호자는 드워프 근원, 사회, 신앙 그리고 삶의 길을 지키는 용사 입니다. 이름에서 알 수 있듯이 방어 기술을 익힌 숙련된 전투원입니다. 드워프 수호자는 3미터 두께의 돌벽 보다도 훨씬 나은 방어벽이며 훨씬 더 위험합니다.

요구사항:
- 가치관: 모든 질서 가치관
종족: 드워프
- 기본 공격 보너스(BAB): +7이상
- 재주: 피하기, 강인함

일반 능력:
- 생명점 주사위(HD): d12
- 숙달: 단순 무기, 군용 무기, 경장, 평장, 중장, 방패
- 기술 점수: 2 + 지능 수정치

레벨
1: 방어적 태세 - 방어적 태세에서는 경이로운 근력과 내구력을 얻게 되지만 방어적 태세를 잡은 곳에서 움직일 수 없습니다. 근력에 +2, 체질에 +4, 모든 내성굴림에 +2, 방어도(AC)에 +4의 보너스를 얻습니다. 이후 2레벨 마다 추가로 능력을 하루에 한번 더 사용 가능 합니다.
2: 방어적 인식 1: 보이지 않는 적을 상대할때나 무방비 상태에서도 방어도(AC)에 민첩 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다.
5: 방어적 인식 2 - 더 이상 측면공격에 당하지 않습니다.
6: 드워프 수호자의 피해 감소 - 3/-의 피해 감소를 얻습니다. 6레벨 이후 4레벨이 오를 때 마다 3씩 피해 감소가 상승합니다.
10: 방어적 인식 3 - 함정을 피할때 내성굴림에 +1점의 반사굴림 보너스를 받습니다.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Dwarven Defender Level 1.
When he needs to, the defender can become a stalwart bastion of defense. In this defensive stance, a defender gains phenomenal strength and durability but he cannot move from the spot he is defending. He gains the following benefits:
 +2 Strength
 +4 Constitution
 +2 resistance bonus on all saves
 +4 dodge bonus to AC
At first level, this ability can be used 1/day. Every 2 levels beyond 1, the dwaven defender gains an additional use per day.
Use: Selected
Text:
방어적 태세(Defensive stance)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 드워프 수호자 레벨 1
세부 사항: 드워프 수호자는 필요할 때 튼튼한 방어 요새가 될 수 있습니다. 방어적 태세에서는 경이로운 근력과 내구력을 얻게 되지만 방어적 태세를 잡은 곳에서 움직일 수 없습니다. 방어적 태세에서는 다음 이점을 얻습니다:
- 근력에 +2
- 체질에 +4
- 모든 내성굴림에 +2의 저항 보너스
- 방어도(AC)에 +4점의 피하기 보너스
레벨 1에는 능력을 하루에 한번 사용 가능합니다. 1레벨 이후 2레벨 마다 추가로 능력을 하루에 한번 더 사용 가능 합니다.
사용: 전투 모드

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Defensive
Specifics: At 6th level, the dwarven defender gains the ability to shrug off 3 points of damage from each blow or attack.  At 10th Level the damage reduction increases to 6 points of damage per attack or blow.
Epic Progression: For each 4 levels after 10, the damage reduction increases by 3 points.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
드워프 수호자의 피해 감소(Dwarven defender damage reduction)
재주 유형: 직업
세부 사항: 드워프 수호자가 6레벨이 되면 3/-의 피해 감소를 얻습니다. 6레벨 이후 4레벨이 오를 때 마다 3씩 피해 감소가 상승합니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Dwarven Defender Level 2.
Specifics: The character retains his Dex bonus to AC, even if caught flat-footed or attacked by a hidden or invisible creature.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
방어적 인식 1(Defensive awareness I)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 드워프 수호자 레벨 2.
세부 사항: 보이지 않는 적을 상대할때나 무방비 상태에서도 방어도(AC)에 민첩 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Dwarven Defender Level 5
Specifics: The character can no longer be flanked, since he can react to opponents on opposite sides of him as easily as he can react to a single attack. The character also retains his Dex bonus to AC, even if caught flat-footed or attacked by a hidden or invisible creature.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
방어적 인식 2(Defensive awareness I)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 드워프 수호자 레벨 5
세부 사항: 더 이상 측면공격에 당하지 않습니다. 또한 보이지 않는 적을 상대할때나 무방비 상태에서도 방어도(AC)에 민첩 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Dwarven Defender Level 10.
Specifics:  The character gains an intuitive sense that alerts him to danger from traps, giving him a +1 bonus to Reflex saves made to avoid traps. Additionally the character cannot be flanked, since he can react to opponents on opposite sides of him as easily as he can react to a single attack and also retains his Dex bonus to AC, even if caught flat-footed or attacked by a hidden or invisible creature.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
방어적 인식 3(Defensive awareness III)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 드워프 수호자 레벨 10
세부 사항: 직관적인 감각을 얻어 함정을 피할때 내성굴림에 +1점의 반사굴림 보너스를 받습니다. 또한 측면공격에 당하지 않으며 보이지 않는 적을 상대할때나 무방비 상태에서도 방어도(AC)에 민첩 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Base Damage: 1d6
Base Critical Threat: x2
Base Damage Type: Bludgeoning
Weapon Size: Medium
Feats Required: Simple, Druid, Monk, Rogue, or Wizard
Text:
기본 피해량: 1d6
기본 치명타 위협: x2
기본 피해 유형: 둔기
무기 크기: 중형
재주 필요: 단순 무기, 드루이드, 수도사, 도적, 마법사

TextEng: Hilltop: one of many small villages that dot the most remote regions of the northern wildlands known as the Silver Marches.
Text: 힐탑: 은빛 경계라고 알려진 북부 야생 지대 가장 외진 곳에 위치한 많은 작은 마을 중 하나입니다.

TextEng: Crypt Tower - Hall of the Dead Wind
. . . For a time, you knew only darkness . . .
Text: . . . 한동안, 당신은 오직 어둠만을 알고 있었다 . . .

TextEng: Library - The smell of wildflowers reminded him of her . . .
Text: 도서관 - 그는 야생화의 향기로 그녀가 생각났다...

TextEng: Library - The temple smelled of blood and sulfur . . .
Text: 도서관 - 그 사원은 피와 유황 냄새를 풍겼다...

TextEng: Library - Sunlight streamed into the long-dark temple . . .
Text: 도서관 - 깊고 어두운 사원 속으로 햇빛이 비쳐 들어왔다. . .

TextEng: Library - And in the depths of hell, he was endlessly tormented . . .
Text: 도서관 - 그리고 지옥의 깊은 곳에서, 그는 끝없이 괴로워했다...

TextEng: Library - And from the depths of hell, he rose forgiven . . .
Text: 도서관 - 그리고 지옥의 깊은 곳에서, 그는 용서를 받고 일어섰다...

TextEng: Library - Amidst a raging blizzard, I sprung my trap upon the Wise Wind . . .
Text: 도서관 - 맹렬한 눈보라가 몰아치는 가운데, 나는 지혜의 바람에게 함정을 놓았다...

TextEng: Library - Beside a calm oasis, I sprung my trap upon the Wise Wind . . .
Text: 도서관 - 고요한 오아시스 옆에서, 나는 지혜의 바람에게 함정을 놓았다...

TextEng: Library - In a darkened wood, I sprung my trap upon the Wise Wind . . .
Text: 도서관 - 어두운 숲에서, 나는 지혜의 바람에게 함정을 놓았다...

TextEng: Library - Along a storm-lashed coast, I sprung my trap upon the Wise Wind . . .
Text: 도서관 - 폭풍이 몰아치는 해안을 따라, 나는 지혜의 바람에게 함정을 놓았다...

TextEng: Temple of the Winds - Chamber of the Mythallar
Temple of the Winds - Outer Sanctum
Plane of Shadow - Lair of the Shadow Lich
The blue enamel on Sir William's armor gleams in the temple's new light.
Text: 윌리엄 경의 갑옷 위의 파란 도료가 신전의 새로운 빛에 반짝입니다.

TextEng: Though strong of build and noble of bearing, this young man is cursed with blindness and a twisted leg that has left him lame.
Text: 이 청년은 건장한 체격에 고결한 태도를 지녔지만, 저주를 받아 눈은 멀고 다리는 뒤틀려 절뚝거리고 있습니다.

TextEng: Evil creatures that feed on the powerful emotions associated with panic, horror, and death, Will-O'-Wisps delight in luring travelers into deadly peril.
Text: 공황, 공포, 죽음과 관련된 강렬한 감정을 먹고 사는 사악한 생명체인 도깨비불은 여행자들을 치명적인 위험으로 유인하는 것을 즐깁니다.

TextEng:
Caster Level(s): Bard 3, Cleric 3, Wizard / Sorcerer 4
Innate Level: 3
School: Abjuration
Descriptor(s):
Component(s): Verbal, Somatic
Range: Touch
Area of Effect / Target: Single
Duration: Instant
Additional Counter Spells:
Save: Harmless
Spell Resistance: No

All curses and curse effects are removed from the target creature.
Text:
저주 해제(Remove curse)시전자 레벨: 음유시인 3, 성직자 3, 마법사/요술사 4
기본 레벨: 3
학파: 방호술
주문 기술어:
구성: 음성, 동작
사거리: 접촉
효과 범위 / 대상: 단일
지속 시간: 즉시
추가 역주문:
내성굴림: 무해함
주문 저항: 불가

대상 생명체의 모든 저주와 저주 효과를 제거합니다.

TextEng:
Caster Level(s): Wizard / Sorcerer 6
Innate Level: 6
School: Transmutation
Descriptor(s):
Component(s): Verbal, Somatic
Range: Medium
Area of Effect / Target: Single
Duration: Permanent
Additional Counter Spells: Flesh to Stone
Save: None
Spell Resistance: No

This spell restores a petrified creature to its normal state, restoring life and goods.
Text:
석화 해제(Stone to flesh)
시전자 레벨: 마법사/요술사 6
기본 레벨: 6
학파: 변환술
주문 기술어:
구성: 음성, 동작
사거리: 20미터
효과 범위 / 대상: 단일
지속 시간: 영구적
추가 역주문: 석화
내성굴림: 없음
주문 저항: 불가

이 주문은 석화가 걸린 생명체의 생명과 아이템을 정상으로 회복시킵니다.

TextEng:
Caster Level(s): Cleric 7
Innate Level: 7
School: Conjuration
Descriptor(s):
Component(s): Verbal, Somatic
Range: Touch
Area of Effect / Target: Single
Duration: Instant
Additional Counter Spells:
Save: Harmless
Spell Resistance: No

Returns a single target corpse to life with full Hit Points.
Text:
부활(Resurrection)
시전자 레벨: 성직자 7
기본 레벨: 7
학파: 소환술
주문 기술어:
구성: 음성, 동작
사거리: 접촉
효과 범위 / 대상: 단일
지속 시간: 즉시
추가 역주문:
내성굴림: 무해함
주문 저항: 불가

대상 시체를 최대 HP로 되살립니다.

TextEng: Courtesan assassins were famous for using their wit and charm to infiltrate the intimate chambers of the enemy by the most disarming method imaginable: they were invited. The practice became infamous, which is likely why it is used so infrequently today.
Text: 창녀 암살자는 자신들의 재치와 매력을 이용해 적의 사적인 침실에 초대받아 침투하는 것으로 유명했습니다. 이런 일들이 악명 높아지는 바람에 오늘날에는 그다지 자주 사용되는 방법은 아닙니다.

TextEng: This magic weapon has an enhancement bonus to attack and damage, but it doesn't bear the hallmarks of any specific maker.
Text: 이 마법 무기는 공격과 피해에 대한 강화 보너스를 가지고 있지만, 특정한 장인의 상징을 지니고 있지는 않습니다.

TextEng: Gloves of the Hin Fist Masters
Temple of the Winds - Rites and Rituals

Text: 밖에서 고통에 찬 남자가 울부짖는 소리
밖에서 고통에 찬 여자가 울부짖는 소리

TextEng: Arcanists' Tower - A Maze of Shadows
Crypt Tower - A Maze of Bones
Heurodis - The Chamber of the Mythallar
Heurodis - The Lost City of Undrentide
Library - The Catching of the Wind
Temple of the Winds - An Empty Ark
Oasis of the Green Palm - Catacomb of Al-Rashid
Text: 녹색 야자의 오아시스 - 알 라시드의 지하 묘지

TextEng: Oasis of the Green Palm - House of the Morninglord
This jar contains an ointment to turn stone to flesh, but only on a creature that was once flesh already.
Text: 이 항아리에는 석화 해제 연고가 들어 있지만, 한 때 살덩이를 가졌었던 생명체에게만 듣습니다.

TextEng: The Oasis of the Green Palm
The OnPlayerEquipItem Event fires when a player equips an Item.
Text: OnPlayerEquipItem 이벤트는 플레이어가 아이템을 장비하면 발동됩니다.

TextEng:
Base Damage: 1d10
Base Critical Threat: x3
Base Damage Type: Slashing
Weapon Size: Medium
Feats Required: Exotic
Text:
기본 피해량: 1d10
기본 치명타 위협: x3
기본 피해 유형: 베기
무기 크기: 중형
재주 필요: 이국적 무기

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class specific
Prerequisite: Assassin level 1 or Blackguard level 1.
Specifics: The  character is trained in the use of poison and never  has to make a dexterity check when applying poison to a blade.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
독 사용(Use Poison)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 암살자 레벨 1 또는 흑기사 레벨 1
세부 사항: 독을 사용하는 방법에 대해 훈련을 받았기 때문에 칼날에 독을 바를 때 민첩 판정을 하지 않습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Monk, Improved Ki Strike +4
Specifics: The monk's unarmed attack counts as a +5 magic weapon against creatures with damage reduction.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
우수한 기 타격 +5(Improved Ki Strike +5)
재주 유형: 일반(초월적)
선결 조건: 수도사, 우수한 기 타격 +4
세부 사항: 수도사의 맨손타격이 피해 감소가 있는 생명체에게 피해를 줄때 +5 마법 무기로 취급됩니다.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Shifter, Epic Druid.
Specifics: The character with this ability can take the shape of a red, green, black, white or blue wyrmling three times per day. He gains the wyrmling's signature ability, its breath weapon. As the shifter rises in levels, the damage potential of the breath weapon increases.
Use: Selected. After choosing the ability, the character must select which kind of wyrmling he wants to transform into.
Text:
상급 야생 형상 1(Greater wildshape I)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 변신술사 레벨 1
세부 사항: 변신술사는 1레벨에 하루에 세번 붉은색, 녹색, 검은색, 백색, 파란색의 5가지 종류의 새끼용으로 변신할 수 있는 능력을 얻습니다. 새끼용의 숨결 무기 피해는 변신술사의 레벨이 오를수록 상승합니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng: Craft Armor - Modify armor appearance failed!
Text: 갑옷 제작 - 갑옷 외형 수정에 실패했습니다!

TextEng: Craft Armor - Modify armor appearance successful!
Text: 갑옷 제작 - 갑옷 외형 수정에 성공했습니다!

TextEng: Automatically check spelling when editing localized strings
Text: 현지화 문자열 편집 시 스펠링을 자동적으로 체크

TextEng: Automatically check spelling when editing conversation nodes
Text: 대화 노드 편집 시 스펠링을 자동적으로 체크

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Epic, Defensive
Prerequisite: 21st Level
Specifics: You can resist the effects of a chosen type of energy (acid, cold, electricity, fire, sonic). Your resistance to the selected kind of energy increases by 10.
Special: A character can take this feat multiple times. If the same type of energy is chosen, the effects stack.
Use: Automatic
Text:
초월적 에너지 저항(Epic energy resistance)
재주 유형: 초월적, 방어
선결 조건: 레벨 21
세부 사항: 선택한 유형의 에너지(산성, 냉기, 전기, 화염, 소리)에 대해 저항할 수 있습니다. 선택한 유형의 에너지에 대해 10의 피해저항을 얻습니다. 이 재주는 여러번 선택할 수 있으며 같은 유형의 에너지를 선택하면 효과는 누적됩니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
(PRESTIGE CLASS)
It is rumored that the magical powers of sorcerers and bards is somehow connected to the presence of dragon blood in their family tree. Red Dragon Disciples are sorcerers, and sometimes bards, who use their magical power as a catalyst to ignite their red dragon blood, realizing its fullest potential. They prefer a life of exploration to a cloistered existence. Already adept at magic, many pursue adventure, especially if it furthers their goal of finding out more about their draconic heritage. They often feel drawn to areas known to harbor dragons.

- Hit Die: Special (see below)
- Proficiencies: A red dragon disciple does not gain any additional weapon or armor proficiencies.
- Skill Points: 2+ Int Modifier.

REQUIREMENTS:

Class: Sorcerer or Bard
Skills: 8 Ranks in Lore

ABILITIES:

Level
1: Draconic Armor - The character's skin develops nearly invisible scales that increase his/her natural armor class by +1.
  Hit Dice Increase (d6) - The character rolls d6 for hit points. This change is not retroactive.
2: Draconic Ability Scores -  Strength +2.
3: Breath Weapon I - The character can breathe a cone of fire, dealing 2d10 points of damage to each opponent caught in the flames.
4: Hit Dice Increase (d8) - The character rolls d8 for hit points. This change is not retroactive.
  Draconic Ability Scores -  Strength +2.
5: Draconic Armor  - The character's skin becomes even harder, raising his/her natural armor class to +2.
6: Hit Dice Increase (d10)  - The character rolls d10 for hit points.  This change is not retroactive.
7: Breath Weapon II - The character's breath weapon damage potential increases to 4d10 points of damage.
  Draconic Ability Scores - Constitution  +2.
8: Draconic Armor - The character's natural armor class increases to +3.
9: Wings  - The character grows red dragon wings.
  Draconic Ability Scores - Intelligence +2.
10: Draconic Armor  - +4 Natural Armor.
  Darkvision - The character gains a dragon's ability to see in the dark.
  Immunity to sleep, paralysis, fire.
  Draconic Ability Scores - Strength +4, Charisma +2.
  Breath Weapon III - The character does 6d10 points of damage with his breath weapon.
Text:
(상위 직업)
요술사와 음유시인의 마법적 힘은 어떻게든 가계도에 용의 혈통이 연관되어 있다는 소문이 있습니다. 적룡의 계승자는 요술사들이고 가끔 음유시인일 때도 있습니다. 이들은 마법의 힘을 적룡의 혈통의 완전한 잠재력에 불을 붙이는 촉매로 사용합니다. 그들은 폐쇄적으로 살기 보다는 탐험을 하는 삶을 더욱 선호합니다. 이미 마법에 능숙한 이들은 모험을 추구하는데, 특히 용의 유산과 관련된 목표라면 더욱 그러합니다. 그들은 종종 용의 보금자리가 있다고 알려진 지역에 끌린다고 느낍니다.

요구사항:
직업: 요술사 또는 음유시인
- 기술: 전승지식 8등급

일반 능력:
- 생명점 주사위(HD): 특별(하단 참조)
- 숙달: 추가적인 숙달 재주가 없습니다.
- 기술 점수: 2 + 지능 수정치

생명점 주사위(HD) 증가: 적룡의 계승자는 레벨이 오르면 때 기본 생명점 주사위(HD) 유형이 변합니다. 이 변경사항은 소급적용되지 않습니다.
- 레벨 1: d6
- 레벨 4: d8
- 레벨 6: d10
- 레벨 10: d12
용족의 갑옷: 방어도(AC)에 직업 레벨에 따라 +1점의 천연갑옷 보너스를 받습니다. 1레벨에는 +1의 보너스를 받으며 5레벨, 8레벨, 10레벨, 15레벨, 20레벨, 25레벨, 30레벨에 +1의 보너스가 더해집니다.
용의 능력: 적룡의 계승자는 레벨을 올릴때마다 다음과 같이 능력 점수가 상승합니다.
- 레벨 2: 근력 +2
- 레벨 4: 근력 +2
- 레벨 7: 체질 +2
- 레벨 9: 지능 +2
- 레벨 10: 근력 +4, 매력 +2
용의 숨결: 적룡의 계승자 레벨에 따라 피해량이 증가하며 내성굴림 난이도(DC)는 10레벨 까지는 19로 고정이며 이후 4레벨 마다 1씩 증가합니다.
3레벨 피해량: 2d10점의 화염 피해
7레벨 피해량: 4d10점의 화염 피해
10레벨 피해량: 6d10점의 화염 피해
10레벨 이상: [6d10 + 10레벨 이후 3레벨 당 1d6]점 의 화염 피해

적룡의 계승자는 레벨 9가 되면 날개를 얻습니다.
적룡의 계승자는 레벨 10이 되면 혼혈용이 되며 다음 재주를 얻습니다: 암시야, 화염 면역, 마비 면역, 수면에 면역

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Red Dragon Disciple.
Specifics: A dragon disciple becomes more draconic in appearance. His skin develops tiny iridescent scales, nearly invisible. This provides increasing natural armor bonuses to his base Armor Class (+1 at 1st, +2 at 5th and +3 at 8th  and +4 at 10th level).
Use: Automatic
Text:
용족의 갑옷(Draconic armor)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 적룡의 계승자 레벨 1
세부 사항: 적룡의 계승자의 외모가 더욱 용족과 같아져 피부에는 거의 보이지 않을정도로 아주 작은 무지갯빛 비늘이 생깁니다. 방어도(AC)에 직업 레벨에 따라 +1점의 천연갑옷 보너스를 받습니다. 1레벨에는 +1의 보너스를 받으며 5레벨, 8레벨, 10레벨, 15레벨, 20레벨, 25레벨, 30레벨에 +1의 보너스가 더해집니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Red Dragon Disciple.
Specifics: As the dragon disciple gains levels in this prestige class, his ability scores increase by the following table:
 Level
 2 :  +2 to Strength
 4 :  +2 to Strength
 7 :  +2 to Con
 9 : +2 to Int
 10: +4 to Strength, +2 to Charisma
Use: Automatic
Text:
용의 능력(Dragon abilities)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 적룡의 계승자 레벨 2
세부 사항: 적룡의 계승자는 레벨을 올릴때마다 다음과 같이 능력 점수가 상승합니다.
- 레벨 2: 근력 +2
- 레벨 4: 근력 +2
- 레벨 7: 체질 +2
- 레벨 9: 지능 +2
- 레벨 10: 근력 +4, 매력 +2
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Red Dragon Disciple level 10.
Specifics: The red dragon disciple gains immunity to paralysis.
Use: Automatic
Text:
마비 면역(Immunity to paralysis)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 적룡의 계승자 레벨 10
세부 사항: 적룡의 계승자는 마비 면역을 얻습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Red Dragon Disciple level 10.
Specifics: The character gains immunity to fire.
Use: Automatic
Text:
화염 면역(Immunity to fire)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 적룡의 계승자 레벨 10
세부 사항: 화염 피해에 면역됩니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Red Dragon Disciple level 3.
Specifics: At third and seventh level, the dragon disciple begins to develop his ancestor's signature ability: a fiery breath weapon. While the damage potential of the breath weapon slowly raises until reaching its full potential on level ten, save DC (19) and area of effect (30' cone) stay the same
 Level
 3:  Damage 2d10
 7:  Damage 4d10
 10: Damage 6d10
Use: Selected
Text:
용의 숨결(Dragon breath)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 적룡의 계승자 레벨 3
세부 사항: 적룡의 계승자는 선조의 특징적인 능력인 화염 숨결을 개발하기 시작합니다. 적룡의 계승자 레벨에 따라 피해량이 증가하며 내성굴림 난이도(DC)는 10레벨 까지는 19로 고정이며 이후 4레벨 마다 1씩 증가합니다.
3레벨 피해량: 2d10점의 화염 피해
7레벨 피해량: 4d10점의 화염 피해
10레벨 피해량: 6d10점의 화염 피해
10레벨 이상: [6d10 + 10레벨 이후 3레벨 당 1d6]점 의 화염 피해
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: Epic Barbarian, Strength 25.
Specifics:  Any weapon the barbarian wields while in a rage does an additional 2d6 points of damage on a critical hit. There is a 50% chance for a creature hit by one of the barbarian's weapons to deafened for 3 rounds.
Use: Automatic
Text:
천둥같은 격노(Thundering rage)
재주 유형: 일반
선결 조건: 초월적 레벨 21, 근력 25이상, 상급 격노
세부 사항: 격노를 사용중일 때 야만전사가 들고 있는 모든 무기의 치평타 피해에 2d6점의 추가 피해를 얻습니다. 또한 야만전사의 무기가 명중하면 대상 생명체는 25%확률로 3라운드 간 청각 상실 상태가 됩니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: Epic Shifter.
Specifics: The character with this ability can transform into a selection of powerful undead creatures three times per day:
Risen Lord, Vampire and Spectre.
Use: Selected. After choosing the ability, the character must select an undead type to change into.
Text:
언데드 형상(Undead shape)
재주 유형: 일반
선결 조건: 초월적 변신술사
세부 사항: 하루에 세번 언데드로 변신할 수 있는 능력을 얻습니다. 변신할 수 있는 언데드는 부활한 군주, 흡혈귀, 악령 입니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: Epic Barbarian, Intimidate 25 ranks.
Specifics:  While the barbarian is raging, any enemy that comes close to him must make a Will save opposed by the barbarian's Intimidate check or becomes panicked for 1d6 rounds. Opponents with up to twice the barbarian's Hit Dice will not flee but will receive a -2 penalty to attack and saving throw rolls. Creatures with more then 2x the barbarian's Hit Dice are not affected by the rage.
Use: Automatic while in rage
Text:
무서운 격노(Terrifying rage)
재주 유형: 일반
선결 조건: 초월적 레벨 21, 위협 등급 25, 상급 격노
세부 사항: 야만전사가 격노를 사용중일 때 접근하는 적들에게 위협 판정을 걸어 의지굴림에 실패한 적들을 1d3 라운드 동안 마비시킵니다. 야만전사 생명점 주사위(HD)의 두배 이내의 적들은 명중굴림과 내성굴림에 -2의 페널티를 받습니다. 야만전사 생명점 주사위(HD)의 두배 이상의 적들은 이 효과를 받지 않습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Epic Spell
Prerequisite: Epic Level Caster, the ability to cast 9th level spells and 34 ranks in spellcraft
Specifics: The spell conjures a powerful magical ward around the caster protecting against all  bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage. It grants damage reduction 50/+20 for 1 round per level.
Use: Cast.
Text:
초월적 주문: 초월적 수호(Epic spell: epic warding)재주 유형: 초월적 주문
선결 조건: 레벨 21, 9레벨 주문 시전 능력, 주문숙련 등급 34
세부 사항: 시전자는 하루에 한번 시전자 레벨 당 1라운드 동안 모든 물리 피해에 대해 50/+20(시전자 레벨 당 50점의 피해를 흡수하면 붕괴)의 피해 감소를 얻을 수 있는 초월적 수호 주문을 사용할 수 있습니다.
사용: 시전

TextEng: Item Creation Feats are not available in the original NWN Campaign or Shadows of Undrentide. Look for them in Hordes of the Underdark.
Text: 아이템 제작 재주는 오리지널 NWN 캠페인 또는 언드렌타이드의 그림자에서 사용할 수 없습니다. 언더다크의 군단에서 사용하십시오.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Harper Scout level 10.
Specifics: At 10th level, the Harper Scout becomes a master of crafting. His indepth knowledge of the crafting skills and secret harper lore allows the character to craft powerful weapons and armor no other class has access to.
Use: Automatic (When using the craft skills)
Text:
제작의 달인(Master crafter)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 하퍼 정찰자 레벨 10
세부 사항: 하퍼 정찰자은 10레벨이 되면 제작의 달인이 됩니다. 제작 기술과 비밀의 하퍼의 전승지식에 대한 깊은 지식으로 다른 직업이 접근할수 없는 강력한 무기와 갑옷을 만들 수 있습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Harper Scout level 6.
Specifics: The harper scout's crafting skills continue to improve, he/she gets a +2 bonus on all Craft (armor, weapon, trap) checks. This improves by an additional +2 for every 2 levels past 6th.
Use: Automatic (When using the craft skills)
Text:
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 하퍼 정찰자 레벨 6
세부 사항: 하퍼 정찰자의 제작 기술은 계속 발전합니다. 모든 제작(갑옷, 무기, 함정) 판정에 +2점의 보너스를 얻습니다. 6레벨 이후 2레벨 마다 추가로 +2점의 보너스가 추가됩니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: Epic Shadowdancer.
Specifics:  The character's Summon Shadow ability is reinforced, allowing him to call an Epic Shadowlord to his side. Unlike a non-epic  Shadowlord, an Epic Shadowlord is a potent fighter, reinforced by his master's lifeforce, making him stronger each time the shadowdancer gains a level.
Use: Automatic
Text:
초월적 그림자 군주(Epic shadowlord)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 초월적 그림자춤꾼
세부 사항: 그림자 소환 능력이 강화되어 초월적 그림자 군주를 소환할 수 있습니다. 초월적 그림자 군주는 이전의 비 초월적인 그림자 군주와 달리 그림자춤꾼의 레벨이 오를 때 마다 강화되는 강력한 전사입니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: Level 15 Blackguard.
Specifics:  The character's evil and hatred grow strong enough to attract the attention of an Epic Vrock when summoning a fiendish servant from the outer planes. This vile creature is a master in the arts of melee combat and, fueled by its master's evil soul, grows in strength and power as the blackguard gains new levels.
Use: Automatic
Text:
초월적 사악한 종복(Epic fiendish servant)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 흑기사 레벨 15
세부 사항: 흑기사의 사악함과 증오가 외부 차원에서 마귀 소환을 할 때 초월적 브록을 불러올 정도가 됩니다. 이 악랄한 생명체는 근접 전투의 달인이며 주인의 사악한 영혼에 힘입어 흑기사 레벨이 오를 때 마다 강력해집니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng: List of Hak Paks attached to module
List of all resources in all Hak Paks
Text: 모든 핵 팩의 모든 리소스 목록

TextEng: Resources found in multiple Hak Paks
Text: 여러 개의 핵 팩에서 찾아낸 리소스

TextEng: Planar Rift Properties (Black Blade of Disaster)
The metal headpiece component of a hammer.

Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Red Dragon Disciple.
Specifics: As the dragon disciple gains levels in this prestige class, his base hit die type changes. This change is not retroactive

Level
1 -  d6
4 -  d8
6 -  d10


Use: Automatic
Text:
생명점 주사위(HD) 증가(Hit die increase)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 적룡의 계승자 레벨 4
세부 사항: 적룡의 계승자는 레벨이 오르면 때 기본 생명점 주사위(HD) 유형이 변합니다. 이 변경사항은 소급적용되지 않습니다.
- 레벨 1: d6
- 레벨 4: d8
- 레벨 6: d10
- 레벨 10: d12
사용: 자동
저장기: 저장된 주문이 모두 제거 되었습니다!

TextEng: Sequencer: Can not store offensive spells!
Text: 저장기: 공격 주문은 저장할 수 없습니다!

TextEng: ...it does not move at all in response.
...but it does not move or respond, if that is the case.
Text: ...그러나 여전히 아무런 움직임이나 반응을 보이지 않는다.

TextEng: ...but now that you look closely, it is surely still.
Text: ...그러나 가까이 다가가 살펴봐도, 여전히 그대로 멈춰 있다.

TextEng: Failure - You can not combine these two items
Text: 실패 - 이 두 아이템을 결합할 수 없습니다.

TextEng: Arcane Spell Failure: This property modifies the effect the item has on the percent chance to successfully cast a spell while wearing it.
Text: 비전 주문 실패: 이 속성은 아이템을 착용하는 동안 주문 시전 성공 확률을 변경합니다.\n

TextEng:
Ironwood is an extremely durable yet light type of wood that can only be found in the oldest and deepest forests. Despite its amazing properties it is considered a non magical material.
Shields made from ironwood are lighter than their counterparts made from oak, and reduce the chance of arcane spell failure.
Text: 경질 목재는 가장 오래되고 깊은 숲에서만 발견되는 내구성이 매우 강하면서도 가벼운 목재입니다. 놀라운 성질에도 불구하고 마법적인 물질로 여겨지지 않습니다.\n경질 목재로 만든 방패는 참나무로 만든 방패보다 더 가볍기 때문에 비전 주문이 실패할 가능성이 더 낮습니다.

TextEng: Store will NOT buy the following items
Text: 상점은 다음 아이템을 절대로 사지 않습니다.

TextEng: Store will ONLY buy the following items
Beholders are formidable opponents, capable of incapacitating their enemies in a variety of horrible ways.
Text: 주시자는 어마어마한 상대이며, 다양하고 끔찍한 방법으로 적을 무력화시킬 수 있습니다.

TextEng: Beholders are formidable opponents, capable of incapacitating their enemies in a variety of horrible ways.
Text: 주시자는 어마어마한 상대이며, 다양하고 끔찍한 방법으로 적을 무력화시킬 수 있습니다.

TextEng: Mind flayers, or illithids, are so insidious, diabolical and powerful that all denizens of the dark fear them. Elder mind flayers were once but a whispered threat, an unseen nightmare. Until now.
Text: 마인드 플레이어 또는 일리시드라 불리는 이들은 매우 음험하고 사악하며 강력하기 때문에 모든 언더다크의 거주자들은 이들을 두려워합니다. 마인드 플레이어 장로는 한때 속삭이는 위협이자, 보이지 않는 악몽이었습니다. 지금까지는 말이죠.

TextEng: Mind flayers, or illithids, are so insidious, diabolical and powerful that all denizens of the dark fear them.
Text: 마인드 플레이어 또는 일리시드라 불리는 이들은 매우 음험하고 사악하며 강력하기 때문에 모든 언더다크의 거주자들은 이들을 두려워합니다.

TextEng: Dracoliches are undead dragons that have taken the path of immortality, gaining tremendous powers and abilities in the process.
Text: 드라코리치는 불멸의 길을 택한 언데드 용으로, 그 과정에서 엄청난 힘과 능력을 얻었습니다.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Shifter
Specifics: A shifter's ability to shapeshift into different forms grows while he is gaining levels. At some point the shifter is able to change into certain forms an infinite number of times per day:
Level 4 : Infinite Greater Wildshape I
Level 7: Infinite Greater Wildshape II
Level 10: Infinite Greater Wildshape III
Level 13: Infinite Humanoid Shape
Level 16: Infinite Greater Wildshape IV
Use: Automatic.
Text:
무한의 상급 야생 형상(Infinite greater wildshape)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 변신술사
세부 사항: 변신술사의 다른 형태로 변하는 능력은 레벨이 오르는 동안 성장합니다. 어느 시점이 되면 변신술사는 하루에 무한으로 특정 형태로 변신할 수 있습니다.
- 레벨 4: 무한의 상급 야생 형상 1
- 레벨 7: 무한의 상급 야생 형상 2
- 레벨 10: 무한의 상급 야생 형상 3
- 레벨 13: 무한의 인간형 형상
- 레벨 16: 무한의 상급 야생 형상 4
사용: 자동

TextEng: Deekin not going to abandons you, boss!
Text: Deekin not going to abandons you, boss!

TextEng:
Base Damage: 1d2
Base Critical Threat: x2
Base Damage Type: Slashing
Weapon Size: Small
Feats Required: Exotic
Special: Can not be used in the off-hand
Text:
기본 피해량: 1d2
기본 치명타 위협: x2
기본 피해 유형: 베기
무기 크기: 소형
재주 필요: 이국적 무기
특별: 보조 손에 장비할 수 없습니다.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Barbarian level 23+.
Specifics: An epic barbarian's damage reduction allows him to ignore the first 5 points of damage from any physical attack. This ability increases by +1 point every 3rd level past 23rd.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
초월적 야만전사의 피해 감소(Epic barbarian damage reduction)
재주 유형: 직업(초월적)
선결 조건: 야만전사 레벨 23 이상
세부 사항: 초월적 야만전사의 피해 감소 재주는 야만전사에게 5/-의 피해감소를 부여합니다. 야만전사 레벨 23 이후 3레벨이 오를때마다 +1점의 보너스를 얻습니다. 이 재주는 피해 감소 재주를 대체합니다.
사용: 자동
탑 다운 카메라 모드 작동 중

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Druid, 22th Level;
Specifics: Upon reaching 22th level, a Druid gains unlimited uses of his Wildshape ability.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
무한의 야생 형상(Infinite wildshape)
재주 유형: 직업(초월적)
선결 조건: 드루이드 레벨 22
세부 사항: 드루이드는 22레벨이 되면 야생 형상 능력을 무한정 사용 가능합니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Druid, 26th Level;
Specifics: Upon reaching 26th level, a Druid gains unlimited uses of his Elemental Shape ability.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
무한의 원소 정령 형상(Infinite elemental shape)
재주 유형: 직업(초월적)
선결 조건: 드루이드 레벨 26
세부 사항: 드루이드는 26레벨이 되면 원소 정령 형상 능력을 무한정 사용 가능합니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng: Descend, chosen of Vix'thra, and serve his will for all time.
Text: Descend, chosen of Vix'thra, and serve his will for all time.

TextEng: Ferron's rebellion will fail. Bow down to Aghaaz now, or be destroyed!
Text: Ferron's rebellion will fail. Bow down to Aghaaz now, or be destroyed!

TextEng: Aghaaz was appointed by the Maker. He must rule until the Maker returns.
Text: Aghaaz was appointed by the Maker. He must rule until the Maker returns.

TextEng: Aghaaz has no claim over any of us! Why do you follow him?
Text: Aghaaz has no claim over any of us! Why do you follow him?

TextEng: The Maker is dead! Aghaaz rules only for Aghaaz. We will never bow down to him!
Text: The Maker is dead! Aghaaz rules only for Aghaaz. We will never bow down to him!

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Epic Assassin.
Specifics: The Assassins natural saving throw bonus to all poisons continues to increase by +1 for each two levels after 10th.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
독 내성 VI+(Poison save VI+)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 초월적 암살자
세부 사항: 암살자는 10레벨 이후 2레벨 마다 모든 독에 대한 천연 내성굴림 보너스가 +1점씩 상승합니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng: Vendui', surfacer. I greet you. Are you aware of who I am?
Text: Vendui', surfacer. I greet you. Are you aware of who I am?

TextEng: So you have made your decision. You are a fool, surfacer.
Text: So you have made your decision. You are a fool, surfacer.

TextEng: Die, then, with the rebels! I shall see you on your knees before me... and then you shall truly know what it is to suffer!
Text: Die, then, with the rebels! I shall see you on your knees before me... and then you shall truly know what it is to suffer!

TextEng: You have chosen wisely, surfacer. You need continue your charade with the rebels for only a short while before my army arrives at Lith My'athar. Do not give yourself away.
Text: You have chosen wisely, surfacer. You need continue your charade with the rebels for only a short while before my army arrives at Lith My'athar. Do not give yourself away.

TextEng: I shall remove the geas I see that you are under now. After that you need only remember: the gates must be opened when my army arrives.
Text: I shall remove the geas I see that you are under now. After that you need only remember: the gates must be opened when my army arrives.

TextEng: Now I will remove this foolish geas Halaster placed you under. After that is done, you need only remember: the gates must be opened.
Text: Now I will remove this foolish geas Halaster placed you under. After that is done, you need only remember: the gates must be opened.

TextEng: You will not regret your decision. Ensure that I do not regret mine.
Text: You will not regret your decision. Ensure that I do not regret mine.

TextEng: XP2 - Queen of the Shattered Mirror
And so she is dead. You have done well, mortal.
Text: And so she is dead. You have done well, mortal.

TextEng: Talk to the Fool. He'll explain what's going on.
Text: Talk to the Fool. He'll explain what's going on.

TextEng: Faerun is a huge continent located on the world of Toril.
Text: 페이룬은 토릴의 세계에 위치한 거대한 대륙입니다.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Weapon of Choice, Epic Weapon Master.
Specifics: The Weapon Master gains a +1 bonus to all attack rolls with their weapon of choice at 13th level and every three levels afterwards. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Master's Superior Weapon Focus feat.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
초월적 우월한 무기 집중(Epic superior weapon focus)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 무기 선택, 초월적 무기의 달인
세부 사항: 무기의 달인은 레벨 13에 무기 선택으로 선택한 무기에 +1의 명중굴림 보너스를 얻습니다. 이후 무기의 달인 3레벨이 오를 때 마다 보너스가 +1 상승합니다. 이 보너스는 무기의 달인의 우월한 무기 집중 재주와 충첩됩니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng: Ioun stones are well known to possess different powers depending upon their color.  When activated they orbit around the head of their owner.  Only 1 lesser ioun stone may be activated at a time. The blue ioun stone increases your wisdom by 2 while active.
Text: 아이운 석은 색깔에 따라 다른 힘을 가진 것으로 잘 알려져 있습니다. 활성화하면 소유자의 머리 주위를 공전합니다. 한 번에 하나의 하급 아이운 석만 활성화할 수 있습니다. 파랑 아이운 석은 활성화 시간 동안 지혜를 2만큼 높여줍니다.

TextEng: Ioun stones are well known to possess different powers depending upon their color.  When activated they orbit around the head of their owner.  Only 1 lesser ioun stone may be activated at a time. The deep red ioun stone increases your dexterity by 2 while active.
Text: 아이운 석은 색깔에 따라 다른 힘을 가진 것으로 잘 알려져 있습니다. 활성화하면 소유자의 머리 주위를 공전합니다. 한 번에 하나의 하급 아이운 석만 활성화할 수 있습니다. 깊은 빨강 아이운 석은 활성화 시간 동안 민첩을 2만큼 높여줍니다.

TextEng: Ioun stones are well known to possess different powers depending upon their color.  When activated they orbit around the head of their owner.  Only 1 lesser ioun stone may be activated at a time. The dusty rose ioun stone increases your AC by 1 while active.
Text: 아이운 석은 색깔에 따라 다른 힘을 가진 것으로 잘 알려져 있습니다. 활성화하면 소유자의 머리 주위를 공전합니다. 한 번에 하나의 하급 아이운 석만 활성화할 수 있습니다. 먼지투성이 장미 아이운 석은 활성화 시간 동안 방어도(AC)를 1만큼 높여줍니다.

TextEng: Ioun stones are well known to possess different powers depending upon their color.  When activated they orbit around the head of their owner.  Only 1 lesser ioun stone may be activated at a time. The pale blue ioun stone increases your strength by 2 for while active.
Text: 아이운 석은 색깔에 따라 다른 힘을 가진 것으로 잘 알려져 있습니다. 활성화하면 소유자의 머리 주위를 공전합니다. 한 번에 하나의 하급 아이운 석만 활성화할 수 있습니다. 창백한 파랑 아이운 석은 활성화 시간 동안 근력을 2만큼 높여줍니다.

TextEng: Lesser Ioun Stone: Pink and Green

Ioun stones are well known to possess different powers depending upon their color.  When activated they orbit around the head of their owner.  Only one lesser ioun stone may be activated at a time. The pink and green ioun stone increases your charisma by two while active.
Text: 아이운 석은 색깔에 따라 다른 힘을 가진 것으로 잘 알려져 있습니다. 활성화하면 소유자의 머리 주위를 공전합니다. 한 번에 하나의 하급 아이운 석만 활성화할 수 있습니다. 분홍빛 초록 아이운 석은 활성화 시간 동안 매력을 2만큼 높여줍니다.

TextEng: Ioun stones are well known to possess different powers depending upon their color.  When activated they orbit around the head of their owner.  Only one ioun stone may be activated at a time. The pink ioun stone increases your constitution by two while active.
Text: 아이운 석은 색깔에 따라 다른 힘을 가진 것으로 잘 알려져 있습니다. 활성화하면 소유자의 머리 주위를 공전합니다. 한 번에 하나의 하급 아이운 석만 활성화할 수 있습니다. 분홍 아이운 석은 활성화 시간 동안 체질을 2만큼 높여줍니다.

TextEng: Lesser Ioun Stone: Scarlet and Blue

Ioun stones are well known to possess different powers depending upon their color.  When activated they orbit around the head of their owner.  Only one lesser ioun stone may be activated at a time. The scarlet and blue ioun stone increases your intelligence by two while active.
Text: 아이운 석은 색깔에 따라 다른 힘을 가진 것으로 잘 알려져 있습니다. 활성화하면 소유자의 머리 주위를 공전합니다. 한 번에 하나의 하급 아이운 석만 활성화할 수 있습니다. 진홍빛 파랑 아이운 석은 활성화 시간 동안 지능을 2만큼 높여줍니다.
거대 거미 동료 생명점 주사위(HD) 15 속성

TextEng: Dire Rat Animal Companion level 25 Bite
Text: 흉포한 시궁쥐 동물 동료 레벨 25 물기

TextEng: Dire Rat Animal Companion level 30 Bite
Text: 흉포한 시궁쥐 동물 동료 레벨 30 물기

TextEng: Dire Rat Animal Companion level 35 Bite
Text: 흉포한 시궁쥐 동물 동료 레벨 35 물기

TextEng: Dire Rat Animal Companion level 40 Bite
Text: 흉포한 시궁쥐 동물 동료 레벨 40 물기

TextEng: This sort of gem can be used on items you equip to light your way.
Text: 이런 종류의 보석을 장비한 아이템에 사용하면 길을 밝힐 수 있습니다.

TextEng: These bulky gauntlets were stitched from the flesh of a great wyrm slain many seasons ago. The slayer, known only as Redshadow, was a dragon disciple, rumored to be the child of the slain dragon. Their epic battle thundered across the skies over the Dragonsfire Mountains. When the great wyrm fell the ground shook in outrage. Redshadow made these powerful gauntlets and wore them till her own death at which point they disappeared, becoming just another part of the legend lost to time...
Text: 이 커다란 팔목장갑은 여러 계절 전에 살해당한 거대 고룡의 피부를 꿰매어 만들어져 있습니다. 붉은그림자로만 알려진 이 살해범은 용의 제자였는데, 살해당한 용의 아이라는 소문이 돌았습니다. 이들의 초월적인 전투는 용의화염 산맥 상공에서 우레와 같은 소리를 냈습니다. 거대 고룡이 쓰러지자 땅이 분노로 흔들렸습니다. 붉은그림자는 이 강력한 팔목장갑을 만들어서 그녀 자신이 죽을 때까지 착용했는데, 그 시점에서 이것들은 사라졌다가 시간이 흐른 뒤에 잊혀진 전설의 또 다른 일부가 되었습니다...

TextEng: Major Ring of Universal Elemental Resistance
This magic weapon has an enhancement bonus to attack and damage, and its blade has been coated with an unknown poison, but it doesn't bear the hallmarks of any specific maker.
Text: 이 마법 무기는 공격과 피해에 대한 강화 보너스가 있으며, 칼날에는 알 수 없는 독이 발라져 있지만, 특정 제작자의 품질 보증 인장은 없습니다.

TextEng: This magic weapon has an enhancement bonus to attack and damage,  but it doesn't bear the hallmarks of any specific maker.
Text: 이 마법 무기는 공격과 피해에 대한 강화 보너스가 있지만, 특정 제작자의 품질 보증 인장은 없습니다.

TextEng: Thomas Alvanthorn led the Circle of Flame, a group of druids dedicated to the use of fire as a tool to replenish the forests. Their actions often led them into direct opposition with other, more traditional druids, who strive to keep the forest free of flame. Still Alvanthorn perservers and many druids wield his Renewal sickles, spreading both flame and the cause.
Text: 토마스 알반쏜은 숲을 다시 매꾸는 도구로서 불을 사용하는 데 전념하는 드루이드 집단인 불꽃의 원을 이끌었습니다. 그들의 행동으로 종종 불꽃으로 부터 숲을 지키려고 애쓰는 다른 전통적인 드루이드들과 직접적으로 대립하였는데. 아직도 알반쏜의 보존자들과 많은 드루이드들이 그의 재탄생 낫을 휘두르며 불꽃과 대의명분을 같이 퍼뜨립니다.

TextEng: The blind smith Izu passed away during a particularly brutal winter in the Silver Marches and it was only after his death that his family discovered his connections with the Harpers. For years Izu toiled on his forge producing weapons and magical equipment for the Harpers. This hammer was given by Izu's heirs to a young Harper Scout whom Izu had been fond of. Sadly, the scout disappeared while mapping the upper reaches of the Underdark.
Text: 맹인 대장장이 이즈는 유별나게 잔인한 은빛 경계의 겨울에 세상을 떠났는데, 그의 가족들은 그가 죽은 후에야 그와 하퍼와의 관계를 알아챘습니다. 이즈는 하퍼를 위해 무기와 마법 장비를 생산하는 대장간에서 수년간 일했습니다다. 이 망치는 이즈의 후계자들이 이즈가 좋아하던 젊은 하퍼 정찰자에게 준 것 입니다. 안타깝게도, 그 정찰자는 언더다크의 상부의 지도를 그리다가 사라져 버렸습니다.

TextEng:
Hordes of the Underdark
Chapter 1
For one, 15th level character.
The strange mage brushes the dust from his sleeves before turning his wild-eyed gaze to you. He surveys you thoroughly up and down, twice, then sniffs dismissively.
Text: The strange mage brushes the dust from his sleeves before turning his wild-eyed gaze to you. He surveys you thoroughly up and down, twice, then sniffs dismissively.

TextEng: Nathyrra seizes your arm and hisses into your ear: "He's an archmage of tremendous power and unstable temperament. Don't make him angry!"
Text: Nathyrra seizes your arm and hisses into your ear: \"He's an archmage of tremendous power and unstable temperament. Don't make him angry!\"

TextEng: Halaster cocks his head to the side. "You really should listen to your friend. Talking back can lead to a gruesome end."
Text: Halaster cocks his head to the side. \"You really should listen to your friend. Talking back can lead to a gruesome end.\"

TextEng: There is a sudden flash of light and the room fills with colored smoke. When the air clears, you see not one but two versions of the mad wizard standing before you.
Text: There is a sudden flash of light and the room fills with colored smoke. When the air clears, you see not one but two versions of the mad wizard standing before you.

TextEng: The first Halaster interrupts before the second can answer your question. "Wait just a moment, my identical friend. You seem somewhat confused, and I want it to end."
Text: The first Halaster interrupts before the second can answer your question. \"Wait just a moment, my identical friend. You seem somewhat confused, and I want it to end.\"

TextEng: The second Halaster shakes his head. "I think you're mistaken, you were only a ploy. I let the drow catch you, you're naught but a toy!"
Text: The second Halaster shakes his head. \"I think you're mistaken, you were only a ploy. I let the drow catch you, you're naught but a toy!\"

TextEng: The first Halaster throws his hands up in exasperation. "Which is the clone, which is the master? How will we know the real Halaster? I can't believe this has happened. What a disaster!"
Text: The first Halaster throws his hands up in exasperation. \"Which is the clone, which is the master? How will we know the real Halaster? I can't believe this has happened. What a disaster!\"

TextEng: Both versions of Halaster turn to look at you, their eyes dark with anger at the interruption. Then, they both smile as an idea pops simultaneously into their heads.
Text: Both versions of Halaster turn to look at you, their eyes dark with anger at the interruption. Then, they both smile as an idea pops simultaneously into their heads.

TextEng: The first Halaster waves his hand, and you feel the power of his spell coursing through you. It feels as if a hundred tiny hooks have been latched onto your very soul.
Text: The first Halaster waves his hand, and you feel the power of his spell coursing through you. It feels as if a hundred tiny hooks have been latched onto your very soul.

TextEng: Nathyrra gasps. "The geas will bind you to Halaster's service. He's compelled you to enter the Underdark and kill the Valsharess. If you don't obey him, you'll wither away and die."
Text: Nathyrra gasps. \"The geas will bind you to Halaster's service. He's compelled you to enter the Underdark and kill the Valsharess. If you don't obey him, you'll wither away and die.\"

TextEng: Drow Handmaidens carry a lot of respect and power in drow society. They reign over the inferior male drow counterparts with an iron fist, brooking no insults and often killing a male simply for getting in their way.
Text: 드로우 시녀는 드로우 사회에서 많은 존경을 받고 있으며, 그만큼 강한 힘도 갖고 있습니다. 그들은 열등한 남자 드로우를 다스리고, 한치의 모욕도 허용하지 않는데, 종종 자신의 앞을 얼쩡거리는 남자 드로우를 내키는 대로 죽여버립니다.

TextEng: Halaster Blackcloak is the ageless and insane creator of Undermountain.
Text: 할라스터 블랙클록은 나이를 먹지 않으며 언더마운틴을 창조한 정신나간 자입니다.

TextEng:
Caster Level(s): Wizard / Sorcerer 6
Innate Level: 6
School: Transmutation
Descriptor(s):
Component(s): Verbal, Somatic
Range: Medium
Area of Effect / Target: Single
Duration: Permanent
Additional Counter Spells: Flesh to stone
Save: None
Spell Resistance: No

This spell restores a petrified creature to its normal state, restoring life and goods.
Text:
석화 해제(Stone to flesh)
시전자 레벨: 마법사/요술사 6
기본 레벨: 6
학파: 변환술
주문 기술어:
구성: 음성, 동작
사거리: 20미터
효과 범위 / 대상: 단일
지속 시간: 영구적
추가 역주문: 석화
내성굴림: 없음
주문 저항: 불가

이 주문은 석화가 걸린 생명체의 생명과 아이템을 정상으로 회복시킵니다.

TextEng: Entrance to Undermountain - 1 GP - CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
Text: 언더마운틴으로 가는 입구 - 1 GP - 별도의 공지가 있을 때까지 폐쇄

TextEng: Little Musings and Magic Shoppe: CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE!
Text: 짧은 묵상과 마법 상점: 다른 공지가 있을 때까지 폐점 합니다!
부두는 추후 통보가 있을 때까지 폐쇄되었습니다.

TextEng:
Hordes of the Underdark
Chapter 3
For one, 22nd level character.
[VFX. ARIBETH TURNS TO ICE. PLAYER GETS SOME ENHANCEMENT. EVIL ALIGNMENT HIT]
Text: [VFX. ARIBETH TURNS TO ICE. PLAYER GETS SOME ENHANCEMENT. EVIL ALIGNMENT HIT]

TextEng: [VFX. ARIBETH TURNS TO ICE. PLAYER GETS SOME ENHANCEMENT. EVIL ALIGNMENT HIT]
Text: [VFX. ARIBETH TURNS TO ICE. PLAYER GETS SOME ENHANCEMENT. EVIL ALIGNMENT HIT]

TextEng: [HE DENOUNCES THE PLAYER BUT IS FORCED TO COMPLY]
Text: [HE DENOUNCES THE PLAYER BUT IS FORCED TO COMPLY]

TextEng: [HE DENOUNCES THE PLAYER BUT IS FORCED TO COMPLY]
Text: [HE DENOUNCES THE PLAYER BUT IS FORCED TO COMPLY]

TextEng: [PLAYER COMMANDS DEEKIN WITH HIS TRUE NAME (Ixthyria the Scalesinger) IF HE HAS IT]
Text: [PLAYER COMMANDS DEEKIN WITH HIS TRUE NAME (Ixthyria the Scalesinger) IF HE HAS IT]

TextEng: [PLAYER COMMANDS VALEN WITH HIS TRUE NAME (Oeskathine the Demonwrestler) IF HE HAS IT]
Text: [PLAYER COMMANDS VALEN WITH HIS TRUE NAME (Oeskathine the Demonwrestler) IF HE HAS IT]

TextEng: [POST-MIMIC] "I've put some thought into it, <FirstName>, and I still feel drawn to Neverwinter. There is a time when I would have sought to haunt the place but perhaps I can be its protector, its guide, somehow."
Text: [POST-MIMIC] \"I've put some thought into it, <FirstName>, and I still feel drawn to Neverwinter. There is a time when I would have sought to haunt the place but perhaps I can be its protector, its guide, somehow.\"

TextEng: [PRE-MIMIC] "Why I can't say I know... Not so long ago, I didn't feel I had a future left to ponder. Let me think on it a while."
Text: [PRE-MIMIC] \"Why I can't say I know... Not so long ago, I didn't feel I had a future left to ponder. Let me think on it a while.\"

TextEng: [POST-MIMIC] "I... This is so hard to talk about, <FirstName>... I betrayed the ones I loved, I failed them so utterly. I led an army of evil to the city's gates and marched them in to occupy and slaughter..."
Text: [POST-MIMIC] \"I... This is so hard to talk about, <FirstName>... I betrayed the ones I loved, I failed them so utterly. I led an army of evil to the city's gates and marched them in to occupy and slaughter...\"

TextEng: [PRE-MIMIC] "I... I'm still trying to figure that out, <FirstName>. I don't think I'm ready to talk about it yet. Maybe we can talk about again sometime in the future..."
Text: [PRE-MIMIC] \"I... I'm still trying to figure that out, <FirstName>. I don't think I'm ready to talk about it yet. Maybe we can talk about again sometime in the future...\"

TextEng: [POST-MIMIC] "I have decided that I am not yet done with Neverwinter. Don't you think the temple there could use a malevolent spirit? Or if holy ground proves troublesome, what of the castle there?"
Text: [POST-MIMIC] \"I have decided that I am not yet done with Neverwinter. Don't you think the temple there could use a malevolent spirit? Or if holy ground proves troublesome, what of the castle there?\"

TextEng: [PRE-MIMIC] "I can't say I'm entirely sure yet. It seems not so long ago I had decided to surrender my ambitions altogether. But you're right, my malevolence is not yet spent."
Text: [PRE-MIMIC] \"I can't say I'm entirely sure yet. It seems not so long ago I had decided to surrender my ambitions altogether. But you're right, my malevolence is not yet spent.\"

TextEng: [POST-MIMIC] "I brought it to its knees, <FirstName>! I cut a swath down the Sword Coast and led an army to its gates! I gave it a nightmare that it may wake from but it will never forget!"
Text: [POST-MIMIC] \"I brought it to its knees, <FirstName>! I cut a swath down the Sword Coast and led an army to its gates! I gave it a nightmare that it may wake from but it will never forget!\"

TextEng: [PRE-MIMIC] "Ha! Don't be so presumptuous, <FirstName>... I hardly know you. I transformed, all right? I touched my destiny! It's a story you're not ready to hear... Come back when you've earned it."
Text: [PRE-MIMIC] \"Ha! Don't be so presumptuous, <FirstName>... I hardly know you. I transformed, all right? I touched my destiny! It's a story you're not ready to hear... Come back when you've earned it.\"

TextEng: [MALE] "Well I was thinking of something a little more pleasurable..."
Text: [MALE] \"Well I was thinking of something a little more pleasurable...\"

TextEng: [MALE] "Take no insult. If I laugh, it is because you have more than exceeded my expectations, <FirstName>."
Text: [MALE] \"Take no insult. If I laugh, it is because you have more than exceeded my expectations, <FirstName>.\"

TextEng: [ROMANCE 1] "It's just... All I ever wanted was to be loved. Is it too late? I mean, what if I go through that portal and there's nothing there for me on the other side? I can't bear to simply relive things, lose myself in the past..."
Text: [ROMANCE 1] \"It's just... All I ever wanted was to be loved. Is it too late? I mean, what if I go through that portal and there's nothing there for me on the other side? I can't bear to simply relive things, lose myself in the past...\"

TextEng: You can feel Aribeth's malevolent eyes boring into you. You can tell she has something to say but she seems intent on making you be the one to ask her.
Text: You can feel Aribeth's malevolent eyes boring into you. You can tell she has something to say but she seems intent on making you be the one to ask her.

TextEng: [MALE] "If I would have known you'd be so easy to disrobe..."
Text: [MALE] \"If I would have known you'd be so easy to disrobe...\"

TextEng: She responds with stony silence, her eye boring jagged holes into your heart.
Text: She responds with stony silence, her eye boring jagged holes into your heart.

TextEng: [ROMANCE 1] "Yes, vengeance... Tell me true, though, <FirstName>. Do you really love me?"
Text: [ROMANCE 1] \"Yes, vengeance... Tell me true, though, <FirstName>. Do you really love me?\"

TextEng: [ROMANCE 1] "But do you love me, <FirstName>? Do you really?"
Text: [ROMANCE 1] \"But do you love me, <FirstName>? Do you really?\"

TextEng: Aribeth smiles sadly amidst the Gatehouse gloom. You find yourself wondering if it pains the dead to die again.
Text: Aribeth smiles sadly amidst the Gatehouse gloom. You find yourself wondering if it pains the dead to die again.

TextEng: Aribeth leers at you from the Gatehouse gloom. She seems to have taken pleasure in the terror of another death.
Text: Aribeth leers at you from the Gatehouse gloom. She seems to have taken pleasure in the terror of another death.

TextEng: ------- This line must be placed at the end of inter-party banter ---------
Text: ------ 이 선은 파티 내부의 잡담 끝 부분에 들어가야 합니다. ----

TextEng: [PC IS FEMALE] "Yes, it is a good thing that we are all women here. Men bring nothing but despair and the treachery of the heart."
Text: [PC IS FEMALE] \"Yes, it is a good thing that we are all women here. Men bring nothing but despair and the treachery of the heart.\"

TextEng: Lady Aribeth runs her ghostly fingers through her hair. You can feel her tension channeling through you, passing through your bones and dissipating.
Text: Lady Aribeth runs her ghostly fingers through her hair. You can feel her tension channeling through you, passing through your bones and dissipating.

TextEng: Ice melts from her face like tears and her hair clings damply to her brow. For the first time, you realize that she's beautiful. Confused, frightened, and defiant, she attacks.
Text: Ice melts from her face like tears and her hair clings damply to her brow. For the first time, you realize that she's beautiful. Confused, frightened, and defiant, she attacks.

TextEng: The fire's ashes are cold and pale.
Text: The fire's ashes are cold and pale.

TextEng: As the berries break open, bursts of energy spark forth, igniting the wood near you. In the heat of the resulting bonfire, the woman before you begins to stir...
Text: As the berries break open, bursts of energy spark forth, igniting the wood near you. In the heat of the resulting bonfire, the woman before you begins to stir...

TextEng: As the berries break open, bursts of energy spark forth, igniting the wood near you. It's a goodly blaze but the warmth seems insufficient to penetrate the frozen statue before you. You'll need a bigger fire.
Text: As the berries break open, bursts of energy spark forth, igniting the wood near you. It's a goodly blaze but the warmth seems insufficient to penetrate the frozen statue before you. You'll need a bigger fire.

TextEng: As the berry breaks open, a burst of energy sparks forth, igniting the wood near you. The fire seems too small to warm the icy cavern, however...
Text: As the berry breaks open, a burst of energy sparks forth, igniting the wood near you. The fire seems too small to warm the icy cavern, however...

TextEng: Tendrils of magic bar your way. Beyond them you can hear a woman's sobs. Her voice, hollow and cold, echoes off the icy walls of her self-imposed prison.
Text: Tendrils of magic bar your way. Beyond them you can hear a woman's sobs. Her voice, hollow and cold, echoes off the icy walls of her self-imposed prison.

TextEng: Cast it on my animal companion.
Text: Cast it on my animal companion.

TextEng: [PC KNOWS TRUE NAME]<StartAction>[Command Aribeth by her True Name]</Start> "Va'ardalia the Twinsouled..."
Text: [PC KNOWS TRUE NAME]<StartAction>[Command Aribeth by her True Name]</Start> \"Va'ardalia the Twinsouled...\"

TextEng: [VFX. ARIBETH TURNS TO ICE. PLAYER GETS SOME ENHANCEMENT. EVIL ALIGNMENT HIT]
Text: [VFX. ARIBETH TURNS TO ICE. PLAYER GETS SOME ENHANCEMENT. EVIL ALIGNMENT HIT]

TextEng: While these assorted gems are shiny and quite nice looking, they have no real value - except that the Mimic seems to like them.

TextEng: True Names: Gru'ul the Quarry Boss
True Names: Your One True Love

Text: 대상은 이미 이 효과를 받고 있습니다!

TextEng:
Ironwood is an extremely durable yet light type of wood that can only be found in the oldest and deepest forests. Despite its amazing properties it is is considered a non magical material.
Weapons made from ironwood are highly accurate and offer a +1 bonus to attack rolls.
Text: 경질 목재는 가장 오래되고 깊은 숲에서만 발견되는 내구성이 매우 강하면서도 가벼운 목재입니다. 놀라운 성질에도 불구하고 마법적인 물질로 여겨지지 않습니다.\n경질 목재로 만든 무기는 명중률이 뛰어나 명중 굴림에 +1의 가접을 얻습니다.

TextEng: I... really, my lady! This is not what I meant at all! I just... I just wanted to tell you how I felt about you!
Text: I... really, my lady! This is not what I meant at all! I just... I just wanted to tell you how I felt about you!

TextEng:
Hordes of the Underdark
Chapter 2
For one, 18th level character.
Cult Temple: Hall of the Sacred One
Underdark: Chasm of the Eye Tyrants
She shakes her head. "Not possible. There's some kind of scavenger golem in there that repairs and rebuilds any golems we manage to take down."
Text: She shakes her head. \"Not possible. There's some kind of scavenger golem in there that repairs and rebuilds any golems we manage to take down.\"

TextEng: This duergar female looks you up and down, gauging your strength and trying to judge if you are a threat. Satisfied that you pose no immediate harm, she seems to relax slightly.
Text: This duergar female looks you up and down, gauging your strength and trying to judge if you are a threat. Satisfied that you pose no immediate harm, she seems to relax slightly.

TextEng: The duergar raise their weapons, but at a signal from their leader they hold their ground. She gives you a quick once over, evaluating you as a potential threat.
Text: The duergar raise their weapons, but at a signal from their leader they hold their ground. She gives you a quick once over, evaluating you as a potential threat.

TextEng: She nods. "Fair enough. As long as you aren't here to cause trouble for us, you can keep your secrets. My name is Dahanna. I'm the leader of this expedition."
Text: She nods. \"Fair enough. As long as you aren't here to cause trouble for us, you can keep your secrets. My name is Dahanna. I'm the leader of this expedition.\"

TextEng: The duergar visibly relaxes, though she is still studying you carefully as she addresses you once more. "My name is Dahanna. I'm the leader of this expedition."
Text: The duergar visibly relaxes, though she is still studying you carefully as she addresses you once more. \"My name is Dahanna. I'm the leader of this expedition.\"

TextEng: She nods thoughtfully. "The Valsharess. I've heard about her. One of the drow matron mothers, isn't she? She's made quite a name for herself recently."
Text: She nods thoughtfully. \"The Valsharess. I've heard about her. One of the drow matron mothers, isn't she? She's made quite a name for herself recently.\"

TextEng: She grins. "But it isn't easy. Not too many expeditions come here anymore. There's still some good metal to be found, but you have to be willing to go toe-to-toe with the Maker's golems."
Text: She grins. \"But it isn't easy. Not too many expeditions come here anymore. There's still some good metal to be found, but you have to be willing to go toe-to-toe with the Maker's golems.\"

TextEng: Dahanna and the other duergar approach you. You notice their weapons are drawn and that they have packed up their camp. Dahanna appears uncomfortable, as if she is ashamed of what is about to happen.
Text: Dahanna and the other duergar approach you. You notice their weapons are drawn and that they have packed up their camp. Dahanna appears uncomfortable, as if she is ashamed of what is about to happen.

TextEng: There's some angry grumbling from the other soldiers, but she cuts them off with a sharp gesture. "I'm not going to let this come to bloodshed only to find out we were fighting over nothing."
Text: There's some angry grumbling from the other soldiers, but she cuts them off with a sharp gesture. \"I'm not going to let this come to bloodshed only to find out we were fighting over nothing.\"

TextEng: The leader of the duergar shakes her head. "I'm sorry for this. But  we count on these expeditions to survive. Each time we come back, we find less and less good metal. We are growing desperate."
Text: The leader of the duergar shakes her head. \"I'm sorry for this. But we count on these expeditions to survive. Each time we come back, we find less and less good metal. We are growing desperate.\"

TextEng: Dahanna looks at you with obvious disbelief, though she takes the offered coins. "You would do this for us, after what just happened? You are more forgiving than we duergar, surfacer."
Text: Dahanna looks at you with obvious disbelief, though she takes the offered coins. \"You would do this for us, after what just happened? You are more forgiving than we duergar, surfacer.\"

TextEng: She smiles. "Thank you for this gift. Our expedition here is over now, we're heading back to our homes and our families. It will be nice to return with a few extra coins."
Text: She smiles. \"Thank you for this gift. Our expedition here is over now, we're heading back to our homes and our families. It will be nice to return with a few extra coins.\"

TextEng: She nods. "Maybe you're right. Perhaps the rewards here are no longer worth the risks. There are other places we can go, places far less dangerous than this island."
Text: She nods. \"Maybe you're right. Perhaps the rewards here are no longer worth the risks. There are other places we can go, places far less dangerous than this island.\"

TextEng: Dahanna sighs. "I was hoping it wouldn't come to this, but I can see you aren't being reasonable. Attack!"
Text: Dahanna sighs. \"I was hoping it wouldn't come to this, but I can see you aren't being reasonable. Attack!\"

TextEng: The soldiers behind Dahanna begin to murmur excitedly, but she cuts them off with a sharp hand gesture. She takes the offered coins and says, "I'm glad this was done without bloodshed."
Text: The soldiers behind Dahanna begin to murmur excitedly, but she cuts them off with a sharp hand gesture. She takes the offered coins and says, \"I'm glad this was done without bloodshed.\"

TextEng: Nathyrra spits on the ground. "You would bargain with this hargluk?"
Text: Nathyrra spits on the ground. \"You would bargain with this hargluk?\"

TextEng: Dahanna ignores her. "If you give us 10,000 gold pieces, we'll let you go on your way without any trouble. If not, we'll take what's rightfully ours by force."
Text: Dahanna ignores her. \"If you give us 10,000 gold pieces, we'll let you go on your way without any trouble. If not, we'll take what's rightfully ours by force.\"

TextEng: This surfacer has proven elusive, too difficult to eliminate. Perhaps there is... something to what you say. Perhaps there is more here than meets the eye.
Text: This surfacer has proven elusive, too difficult to eliminate. Perhaps there is... something to what you say. Perhaps there is more here than meets the eye.

TextEng: You. Male! Send for my commanders. I desire their presence now!
Text: You. Male! Send for my commanders. I desire their presence now!

TextEng: I will gather all my remaining forces, if I must. The rebels must be dealt with, and the surfacer... will hide from me no longer.
Text: I will gather all my remaining forces, if I must. The rebels must be dealt with, and the surfacer... will hide from me no longer.

Text: Ok - tell me what plots you have done.

TextEng: Ok - now that you've worked so hard - you need to rest. Return to your room at the Tavern and try to rest.  We shall wake you when our pickets report the approach of the Valsharess's army.
Text: Ok - now that you've worked so hard - you need to rest. Return to your room at the Tavern and try to rest. We shall wake you when our pickets report the approach of the Valsharess's army.

TextEng: This wisp appears to be little more than a ball of dancing light.
Text: 이 도깨비불은 춤추는 빛의 공에 지나지 않는 것처럼 보입니다.

TextEng: Like all drow, this woman is beautiful, but her features have a softness not usually found in her kind. Her eyes are deep wells of wisdom, hinting at both advanced age and limitless compassion.
Text: 이 여성은 모든 드로우와 같이 아름답지만, 그녀의 이목구비에는 일반적으로 그녀의 종족에서 찾아볼 수 없는 부드러움이 있습니다. 그녀의 눈은 깊은 지혜의 샘으로써, 넌지시 많은 세월과 끝없는 동정심을 암시하고 있습니다.

TextEng: This woman has the look of a fierce warrior.
Thralls of the illithid fighting pits are little more than mindless beasts.
Text: 일리시드 싸움 구덩이의 노예는 생각없는 야수에 불과합니다.

TextEng: Planetars resemble muscular humans with emerald skin, hairless heads and feathered wings.
Text: 플레네타는 에메랄드빛 피부에 머리카락이 없는 머리와 깃털달린 날개를 가진 근육질의 인간처럼 생겼습니다.

TextEng: This drow wears the robes of the Red Sisters, an elite group of assassins.
Text: 이 드로우는 정예 암살자 집단인 붉은 자매단의 로브를 입고 있습니다.

TextEng: Duergar Merchant: Isle of the Maker

Text: 리스 마이아사 주변 지역으로 가는 관문

TextEng: Hidden Wall of Swords Lever Trigger
The Rebel Camp: An Army is Born
The Yawning Portal: Mephistopheles Gains the Surface
Master Robes of the Old Order
A horrible creature, its flesh is sickly and yellow, covered with warts and oozing sores. Its long, filthy hair resembles rotting seaweed.
Text: 끔찍한 생명체로, 피부는 병들어 노랗고 사마귀와 새어나오는 고름으로 덮여있습니다. 이들의 길고 불결한 머리칼은 썩어 문드러진 해초를 닮았습니다.

Text: Saving is disabled while playing this DEMO module.

TextEng: There was an error generating your character file.
Text: There was an error generating your character file.

TextEng: Aptly called a "landshark," the bulette is a terrifying predator that lives only to eat.
Text: 땅상어라고도 불리는, 불렛은 오직 먹기 위해 사는 무서운 포식자입니다.

TextEng: Troglodytes are cave-dwelling reptilian humanoids who take pleasure in fighting battles and in eating the bodies of their dead foes. While not very bright, trogs are known for their ferocity, cunning, and horrific stench.
Text: 동굴인은 동굴에 사는 인간형 파충류 생명체로써 전투를 즐기고 죽은 적의 시체를 먹는 것을 즐깁니다. 똑똑하지는 않지만, 흉포함과 교활함 그리고 끔찍한 악취로 유명합니다.

TextEng:
When a Troglodyte is angry or frightened it secretes an oily, musk like chemical that nearly every form
of animal life finds offensive.

All creatures (except Troglodytes) within 30 ft must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 13) or be overcome with nausea.
This lasts for 10 rounds and deals 1d6 points of temporary Strength damage.
Text:
동굴인은 화가 나거나 겁을 먹으면, 거의 모든 형태의 생물들이 불쾌하게 여기는 기름진 사향 같은 화학물질을 분비합니다.

9미터 이내의 모든 생명체(동굴인 제외)는 인내굴림(DC 13)에서 성공하지 않으면 구역질을 하게됩니다.
구역질은 10라운드 동안 지속되며, 그동안 1d6점의 일시적인 근력 피해를 입습니다.

TextEng:
A Sea Hag's appearance is so revolting that those setting eyes upon the Hag
must make a Fortitude save (DC 11) or temporarily lose 2d8 points of strength.
Text: 바다 할망구의 외모는 너무 혐오스럽기 때문에 쳐다보는 사람들은 인내굴림(DC 11)에 실패하면 일시적으로 2d8 포인트의 근력을 잃습니다.

TextEng:
A dire gaze can be cast upon any single creature within 30 feet.
The target must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 11).
Creatures who fail lose 5 points from both strength and constitution and
also have a 25% chance of losing 5 points from all ability scores due to fright.
Text:
무시무시한 응시는 9미터 이내의 어떤 생명체에게라도 시전할 수 있습니다.
대상은 인내굴림(DC 11)에 성공해야 합니다.
굴림에 실패한 생명체는 근력과 체질 모두에서 5점을 잃으며 또한 공포때문에 25% 확률로 모든 능력 점수에서 5점을 잃습니다.

Text: Weathered Ship Merchant Ship docked together
