TextEng:
(PRESTIGE CLASS)
Worshipers of the Orc deity Gruumsh that have put out their own right eye in a bloody and painful ritual. These living martyrs to Gruumsh are some of the toughest orcs and half-orcs in the world.
The eye of Gruumsh is a true prestige class in the sense that all orcs respect those who achieve it.
Barbarians gain the most value from this prestige class, since it encourages raging as a fighting style

- Hit Die: d12
- Proficiencies: Simple and Martial Weapons, Light, and Medium Armor Proficiency, Shields
- Skill Points: 2 + Int Modifier.

REQUIREMENTS:

Alignment: Chaotic evil, choatic neutral, or neutral evil.
Race: Half-Orc or Orc
Feats: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Double Axe), Weapon Focus (Double Axe).
Base Attack Bonus: +6

ABILITIES:

Level
1: Blind-Fight.
  Command the Horde
  Rage 1/day.
2. Swing Blindly - The character's rage's become more powerful granting a +4 strength bonus, while also suffering a -4 armor bonus while raging.
3: Ritual Scarring - Through frequent disfiguration of his own skin, the eye of Gruumsh gains a +1 natural armor bonus.
4: Blinding Spittle - The character can spit their stomach acid into a target's eyes 2/day.
  Rage 2/day.
5: Blindsight - The character gains blindsight in a 5 foot radius.
6: Ritual Scarring - The eye of Gruumsh's natural armor bonus increases to +2.
7: Blinding Spittle 4/day.
8: Blindsight 10 foot radius.
  Rage 3/day.
9: Ritual Scarring - The eye of Gruumsh's natural armor bonus increases to +3.
10: Sight of Gruumsh - The character gains a +2 morale bonus on all saving throws.
Text:
(PRESTIGE CLASS)
Worshipers of the Orc deity Gruumsh that have put out their own right eye in a bloody and painful ritual. These living martyrs to Gruumsh are some of the toughest orcs and half-orcs in the world.
The eye of Gruumsh is a true prestige class in the sense that all orcs respect those who achieve it.
Barbarians gain the most value from this prestige class, since it encourages raging as a fighting style

- Hit Die: d12
- Proficiencies: Simple and Martial Weapons, Light, and Medium Armor Proficiency, Shields
- Skill Points: 2 + Int Modifier.

REQUIREMENTS:

Alignment: Chaotic evil, choatic neutral, or neutral evil.
Race: Half-Orc or Orc
Feats: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Double Axe), Weapon Focus (Double Axe).
Base Attack Bonus: +6

ABILITIES:

Level
1: Blind-Fight.
 Command the Horde
 Rage 1/day.
2. Swing Blindly - The character's rage's become more powerful granting a +4 strength bonus, while also suffering a -4 armor bonus while raging.
3: Ritual Scarring - Through frequent disfiguration of his own skin, the eye of Gruumsh gains a +1 natural armor bonus.
4: Blinding Spittle - The character can spit their stomach acid into a target's eyes 2/day.
 Rage 2/day.
5: Blindsight - The character gains blindsight in a 5 foot radius.
6: Ritual Scarring - The eye of Gruumsh's natural armor bonus increases to +2.
7: Blinding Spittle 4/day.
8: Blindsight 10 foot radius.
 Rage 3/day.
9: Ritual Scarring - The eye of Gruumsh's natural armor bonus increases to +3.
10: Sight of Gruumsh - The character gains a +2 morale bonus on all saving throws.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 4.
Specifics: At 4th level, an Eye of Gruumsh can launch blinding spittle at any opponent within 20 feet. Using a ranged touch attack (at a -4 penalty), he spits his stomach acid into the target's eyes. An opponent who fails a Reflex save (DC 10 + eye of Gruumsh level + eye of Gruumsh's Constitution bonus) is blinded until he or she can rinse away the spittle. This attack has no effect on creatures that don't have eyes or don't depend on vision.  Blinding spittle is usable 2/day at 4th level and 4/day at 7th level.
Use: Combat Mode.
Text:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 4.
Specifics: At 4th level, an Eye of Gruumsh can launch blinding spittle at any opponent within 20 feet. Using a ranged touch attack (at a -4 penalty), he spits his stomach acid into the target's eyes. An opponent who fails a Reflex save (DC 10 + eye of Gruumsh level + eye of Gruumsh's Constitution bonus) is blinded until he or she can rinse away the spittle. This attack has no effect on creatures that don't have eyes or don't depend on vision. Blinding spittle is usable 2/day at 4th level and 4/day at 7th level.
Use: Combat Mode.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 1.
Specifics: At 1st level, the Eye of Gruumsh may grant a +2 morale bonus on Will saving throws to any nongood orcs or half-orcs with Hit Dice lower than his character level within 30 feet. The effect lasts for 1 hour per eye of Gruumsh level.
Use: Combat Mode.
Text:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 1.
Specifics: At 1st level, the Eye of Gruumsh may grant a +2 morale bonus on Will saving throws to any nongood orcs or half-orcs with Hit Dice lower than his character level within 30 feet. The effect lasts for 1 hour per eye of Gruumsh level.
Use: Combat Mode.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 2.
Specifics: At 2nd level, the Eye of Gruumsh's rage ability becomes more powerful at the cost of lower defenses. The character gains an additional +4 bonus to his strength score while raging, while his armor class penalty increases to -4.
Use: Combat Mode.
Text:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 2.
Specifics: At 2nd level, the Eye of Gruumsh's rage ability becomes more powerful at the cost of lower defenses. The character gains an additional +4 bonus to his strength score while raging, while his armor class penalty increases to -4.
Use: Combat Mode.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 3.
Specifics: Through frequent disfiguration of his own skin, the eye of Gruumsh gains a +1 natural armor bonus at 3rd level. This bonus increases by +1 for every three eye of Gruumsh levels gained thereafter.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 3.
Specifics: Through frequent disfiguration of his own skin, the eye of Gruumsh gains a +1 natural armor bonus at 3rd level. This bonus increases by +1 for every three eye of Gruumsh levels gained thereafter.
Use: Automatic.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 5.
Specifics: At 5th level, the Eye of Gruumsh gains blindsight in a 5 foot radius. Using hearing the eye of Gruumsh maneuvers and fights as well as a sighted creature. Invisibility and darkness are irrelevant within this range. The eye of Gruumsh does not need to make Spot or Listen checks to notice creatures within range of his blindsight ability.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 5.
Specifics: At 5th level, the Eye of Gruumsh gains blindsight in a 5 foot radius. Using hearing the eye of Gruumsh maneuvers and fights as well as a sighted creature. Invisibility and darkness are irrelevant within this range. The eye of Gruumsh does not need to make Spot or Listen checks to notice creatures within range of his blindsight ability.
Use: Automatic.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 8.
Specifics: At 8th level, the Eye of Gruumsh gains blindsight in a 10 foot radius. Using hearing the eye of Gruumsh maneuvers and fights as well as a sighted creature. Invisibility and darkness are irrelevant within this range. The eye of Gruumsh does not need to make Spot or Listen checks to notice creatures within range of his blindsight ability.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 8.
Specifics: At 8th level, the Eye of Gruumsh gains blindsight in a 10 foot radius. Using hearing the eye of Gruumsh maneuvers and fights as well as a sighted creature. Invisibility and darkness are irrelevant within this range. The eye of Gruumsh does not need to make Spot or Listen checks to notice creatures within range of his blindsight ability.
Use: Automatic.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 10.
Specifics: At 10th level, the Eye of Gruumsh sees the moment of his own death through his missing eye. This foreknowledge gives him a +2 morale bonus on all saving throws from then on.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Eye of Gruumsh level 10.
Specifics: At 10th level, the Eye of Gruumsh sees the moment of his own death through his missing eye. This foreknowledge gives him a +2 morale bonus on all saving throws from then on.
Use: Automatic.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: None.
Specifics: Using nonvisual senses, such as sensitivity to vibrations, scent, acute hearing, or echolocation, the creature maneuvers and fights as well as a sighted creature. Invisibility and darkness are irrelevant. The creature usually does not need to make Spot or Listen checks to notice creatures within range of its blindsight ability.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
맹시, 18미터 반경(Blindsight, 60 foot radius)
재주 유형: 괴물
선결 조건: 없음
세부 사항: 진동, 향기, 예민한 청각, 반향과 같은 비시야적인 감각을 사용하여 생명체는 눈이 보이는 생명체와 같이 움직이고 잘 싸울 수 있습니다. 투명화나 암흑과도 무관하며 일반적인 눈먼 생명체가 근처에 생명체가 있는지 확인할 때 해야 하는 발견, 듣기 판정을 할 필요가 없습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
(PRESTIGE CLASS)
Shou disciples are martial artists who have studied or observed the monks of Kara-Tur and seek to emulate their style. Focusing more on the martial aspects of a monk's training, they sacrifice the enlightenment and supernatural abilities of the true ascetic. Shou disciples fight with martial weapons and often wear armor, instantly marking them as different from monks.

- Hit Die: d10
- Proficiencies: Martial and Monk Weapons, Light Armor Proficiency.
- Skill Points: 2 + Int Modifier.

REQUIREMENTS:

Feats: Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Weapon Focus (Unarmed Strike)
Base Attack Bonus: +3
Skills: Tumble 4 ranks
Base Reflex Save: +2

ABILITIES:

Level
1: Shou Disciple Dodge Bonus +1 (replaces the normal +1 dodge feat bonus).
  Unarmed Strike - The character deals 1d6 of unarmed damage. A Shou disciple with levels in the monk class will use the better of the two damage ranges, or the unarmed damage calculated by combining his Shou disciple and monk levels and using the unarmed damage of a monk of the resulting level if it produces a better result.
  Wearing light armor does not interfere with any of the Shou disciple's class abilities, but shields and medium or heavy armor do.
2: Unarmed Strike - The character deals 1d8 of unarmed damage.
  Shou Disciple Dodge Bonus +2
  Bonus Feat - Chosen from the following list if the prerequisites are met: Deflect Arrows, Expertise, Improved Initiative, Improved Knockdown, Mobility, Power Attack, Spring Attack, Weapon Finesse and Weapon Specialization.
3: Unarmed Strike - The character deals 1d10 of unarmed damage.
  Martial Flurry (light) - The character gains the ability to use any light melee weapon for his flurry of blows.
4: Shou Disciple Dodge Bonus +3
  Bonus Feat - Chosen from the following list if the prerequisites are met: Deflect Arrows, Expertise, Improved Initiative, Improved Knockdown, Mobility, Power Attack, Spring Attack, Weapon Finesse and Weapon Specialization.
5: Unarmed Strike - The character deals 2d6 of unarmed damage.
  Martial Flurry (any) - The character gains the ability to use any melee weapon for his flurry of blows.

(PRESTIGE CLASS)
Shou disciples are martial artists who have studied or observed the monks of Kara-Tur and seek to emulate their style. Focusing more on the martial aspects of a monk's training, they sacrifice the enlightenment and supernatural abilities of the true ascetic. Shou disciples fight with martial weapons and often wear armor, instantly marking them as different from monks.

- Hit Die: d10
- Proficiencies: Martial and Monk Weapons, Light Armor Proficiency.
- Skill Points: 2 + Int Modifier.

REQUIREMENTS:

Feats: Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Weapon Focus (Unarmed Strike)

Skills: Tumble 4 ranks

ABILITIES:

Level
1: Shou Disciple Dodge Bonus +1 (replaces the normal +1 dodge feat bonus).
 Unarmed Strike - The character deals 1d6 of unarmed damage. A Shou disciple with levels in the monk class will use the better of the two damage ranges, or the unarmed damage calculated by combining his Shou disciple and monk levels and using the unarmed damage of a monk of the resulting level if it produces a better result.
 Wearing light armor does not interfere with any of the Shou disciple's class abilities, but shields and medium or heavy armor do.
2: Unarmed Strike - The character deals 1d8 of unarmed damage.
 Shou Disciple Dodge Bonus +2
 Bonus Feat - Chosen from the following list if the prerequisites are met: Deflect Arrows, Expertise, Improved Initiative, Improved Knockdown, Mobility, Power Attack, Spring Attack, Weapon Finesse and Weapon Specialization.
3: Unarmed Strike - The character deals 1d10 of unarmed damage.
 Martial Flurry (light) - The character gains the ability to use any light melee weapon for his flurry of blows.
4: Shou Disciple Dodge Bonus +3
 Bonus Feat - Chosen from the following list if the prerequisites are met: Deflect Arrows, Expertise, Improved Initiative, Improved Knockdown, Mobility, Power Attack, Spring Attack, Weapon Finesse and Weapon Specialization.
5: Unarmed Strike - The character deals 2d6 of unarmed damage.
 Martial Flurry (any) - The character gains the ability to use any melee weapon for his flurry of blows.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Shou Disciple level 2.
Specifics: Shou disciples are highly trained at dodging blows, giving the Shou disciple a +2 dodge bonus for his Dodge feat at 2nd level . A condition that makes the Shou disciple lose his Dexiterity bonus to armor class also makes him lose this dodge bonus.
Use: Automatic.

Prerequisite: Shou Disciple level 3.

Use: Combat Mode.

TextEng: You are too large to equip that item.
Text: You are too large to equip that item.

TextEng: This three-tined variation of a spear is a favored weapon of some undersea humanoids.
Text: This three-tined variation of a spear is a favored weapon of some undersea humanoids.

TextEng: Reaching anywhere from 9 to 13 feet long, the Mako is one of the most terrifying hunters of the sea. Renowned for its speed and ability to really freak the heck out of anyone who thought it was a good idea to go swimming even after that old fisherman guy said that was a bad idea.
Text: Reaching anywhere from 9 to 13 feet long, the Mako is one of the most terrifying hunters of the sea. Renowned for its speed and ability to really freak the heck out of anyone who thought it was a good idea to go swimming even after that old fisherman guy said that was a bad idea.

TextEng: A relentless and cold killer whose unusual head shape allows for greater maneuverability in close quarters. Its ability to detect prey by smell is nearly ten times as sensitive as its shark brothers and thus makes a point showing off in front of all the girl sharks.
Text: A relentless and cold killer whose unusual head shape allows for greater maneuverability in close quarters. Its ability to detect prey by smell is nearly ten times as sensitive as its shark brothers and thus makes a point showing off in front of all the girl sharks.

TextEng: This extremely rare type of shark is distinctive for its long beak that protrudes out over its vicious jaws. Most adventurers when sighting a Goblin Shark for the first time are stunned by how deeply weird it looks and usually succumb to rows of pointed teeth soon after.
Text: This extremely rare type of shark is distinctive for its long beak that protrudes out over its vicious jaws. Most adventurers when sighting a Goblin Shark for the first time are stunned by how deeply weird it looks and usually succumb to rows of pointed teeth soon after.

TextEng: Highly intelligent coastal birds that have learned to co-exist with civilization in a scavenger role. Known for their distinctive squawks, white to gray coloring with black markings and distinct lack of toilette training.
Text: Highly intelligent coastal birds that have learned to co-exist with civilization in a scavenger role. Known for their distinctive squawks, white to gray coloring with black markings and distinct lack of toilette training.

TextEng: Sometimes referred to as sea devils, sahuagin are marine predators that are superb underwater fighters as well as known for their midnight raids on the surface.
Text: Sometimes referred to as sea devils, sahuagin are marine predators that are superb underwater fighters as well as known for their midnight raids on the surface.

TextEng: This amorphous creature resembles a harmless puddle of water.
Text: This amorphous creature resembles a harmless puddle of water.

TextEng: This amorphous creature resembles a dark yellow amoeba.
Text: This amorphous creature resembles a dark yellow amoeba.

TextEng: Seaweed still clings to the salt-bleached wood.
Text: Seaweed still clings to the salt-bleached wood.

TextEng: Bubbles stream upwards from a small fissure in the sea floor. Whether they are a product of geothermal activity or some form of life that lurks below, you cannot tell.
Text: Bubbles stream upwards from a small fissure in the sea floor. Whether they are a product of geothermal activity or some form of life that lurks below, you cannot tell.

TextEng: A small candle floats on a driftwood plank.
Text: A small candle floats on a driftwood plank.

TextEng: Seashells and colored sands have been mixed in with the candlewax.
Text: Seashells and colored sands have been mixed in with the candlewax.

TextEng: You wonder what desperate sea battle caused this treasure chest to be cast overboard, still unopened.
Text: You wonder what desperate sea battle caused this treasure chest to be cast overboard, still unopened.

Text: A hidden chest rises from the sands...

TextEng: This is one of a variety of shells found in and around coastal regions.
Text: This is one of a variety of shells found in and around coastal regions.

TextEng: A small school of fish darts about, seemingly oblivious to your presence.
Text: A small school of fish darts about, seemingly oblivious to your presence.

TextEng: This starfish has one more arm than you were expecting.
Text: This starfish has one more arm than you were expecting.

TextEng: This shrine seems to be for the worship of some sort of aquatic god.
Text: This shrine seems to be for the worship of some sort of aquatic god.

TextEng: Skeletal remains adorn this barnacle-encrusted shrine.
Text: Skeletal remains adorn this barnacle-encrusted shrine.

TextEng: You gaze at your reflection in the puddle. You look pretty good today, all things considered.
Text: You gaze at your reflection in the puddle. You look pretty good today, all things considered.

TextEng: The clamshell that forms the back of this simple chair is bigger than any you've ever seen.
Text: The clamshell that forms the back of this simple chair is bigger than any you've ever seen.

TextEng: The Jolly Roger grimaces at you from this tattered pennant.
Text: The Jolly Roger grimaces at you from this tattered pennant.

TextEng: This salt-stiffened pennant bears the parting waves of the sea goddess, Umberlee.
Text: This salt-stiffened pennant bears the parting waves of the sea goddess, Umberlee.

TextEng: The parrot eyes you warily, stepping back and forth along its perch.
Text: The parrot eyes you warily, stepping back and forth along its perch.

Text: The kelp sways gently in the ocean current.

TextEng: This egg is large and heavy. You wonder what manner of creature lies dead or dormant within its shell.

TextEng: A pair of brightly colored eggs rests in a nest of dried palm fronds.

TextEng: This nest of palm fronds seems like it hasn't been occupied in a while.

TextEng: Barnacles encrust this weathered throne. The bones of its last occupant still call it home.
Text: Barnacles encrust this weathered throne. The bones of its last occupant still call it home.

TextEng: The skeleton of a small creature, probably a dwarf, sways in the breeze.
Text: The skeleton of a small creature, probably a dwarf, sways in the breeze.

TextEng: You don't quite recognize the creature depicted by this barnacle-encrusted statue but it's clearly aquatic in nature. The stone is old and deeply weathered.

TextEng: Fossilized sea life lends some maritime charm to this beautiful marble table.
Text: Fossilized sea life lends some maritime charm to this beautiful marble table.

TextEng: These snakes are not common, but are found in the forests and marshes of Cormyr. They are dangerous when approached, and at times can be found in groups, though the reason for this is not known.
Text: These snakes are not common, but are found in the forests and marshes of Cormyr. They are dangerous when approached, and at times can be found in groups, though the reason for this is not known.

TextEng: Related to the Black Cobra, these snakes are rare. They are found in damp places, surviving often where other creatures do not. They are dangerous when approached, and at times can be found in groups, though the reason for this is not known.
Text: Related to the Black Cobra, these snakes are rare. They are found in damp places, surviving often where other creatures do not. They are dangerous when approached, and at times can be found in groups, though the reason for this is not known.

TextEng: These snakes are not common, but are found in the forests and marshes of Cormyr. They are dangerous when approached, and at times can be found in groups, though the reason for this is not known. This one seems to have mutated in some way.
Text: These snakes are not common, but are found in the forests and marshes of Cormyr. They are dangerous when approached, and at times can be found in groups, though the reason for this is not known. This one seems to have mutated in some way.

TextEng: Spitting cobras can quirt a stream of venom several feet, aiming for the eyes of their prey. When approached without caution, these snakes can be dangerous.
Text: Spitting cobras can quirt a stream of venom several feet, aiming for the eyes of their prey. When approached without caution, these snakes can be dangerous.

TextEng: These 10 foot golems are often carved in the likenesses of knights or warriors.
Text: These 10 foot golems are often carved in the likenesses of knights or warriors.

TextEng: Emerald Golems have facets of dark green, often with sparks in their eyes. No matter how an Emerald Golem is carved, it will slowly transform to a female form. Like other gemstone golems, they are immune to most magic.
Text: Emerald Golems have facets of dark green, often with sparks in their eyes. No matter how an Emerald Golem is carved, it will slowly transform to a female form. Like other gemstone golems, they are immune to most magic.

TextEng: Ruby Golems are 9 feet tall, with facets ranging from bright red to almost black. They are softer than other gemstone golems, but highly resistant to magic.
Text: Ruby Golems are 9 feet tall, with facets ranging from bright red to almost black. They are softer than other gemstone golems, but highly resistant to magic.

TextEng: Nightmares are proud and evil creatures with hearts as black as the dark abysses from which they come. They are wild and restless creatures, doing evil wherever they can.
Text: Nightmares are proud and evil creatures with hearts as black as the dark abysses from which they come. They are wild and restless creatures, doing evil wherever they can.

TextEng: Satyrs are hedonistic creatures that frolic in the wild places. They are keen on drink and drunkeness, but can make stealthy hunters too.
Text: Satyrs are hedonistic creatures that frolic in the wild places. They are keen on drink and drunkeness, but can make stealthy hunters too.

TextEng: Larger than an ogre, these great lizards are distant cousins of dragons. Though capable of draconic speech, they have low intelligence and are aggressive in nature. Wyverns are common still over Lake Wyvernwater.
Text: Larger than an ogre, these great lizards are distant cousins of dragons. Though capable of draconic speech, they have low intelligence and are aggressive in nature. Wyverns are common still over Lake Wyvernwater.

TextEng: Whatever their form, wereboars fight with the ferocity of a cornered wild boar. These lycanthropes are tenacious and difficult to bring down.
Text: Whatever their form, wereboars fight with the ferocity of a cornered wild boar. These lycanthropes are tenacious and difficult to bring down.

TextEng: Mist dragons are normally solitary and philosophical. Their favorite activity is sitting quietly and thinking. They hate being disturbed and they dislike conversation.
Text: Mist dragons are normally solitary and philosophical. Their favorite activity is sitting quietly and thinking. They hate being disturbed and they dislike conversation.

TextEng: A 'blade' of the Purple Dragons, the regular soldiers of Cormyr. These men and women are tough and experienced after the recent war with the ghazneths that rolled across Cormyr.
Text: A 'blade' of the Purple Dragons, the regular soldiers of Cormyr. These men and women are tough and experienced after the recent war with the ghazneths that rolled across Cormyr.

TextEng: The heart of a shattered Gem Golem, a flawless ruby.
Text: The heart of a shattered Gem Golem, a flawless ruby.

TextEng: The heart of a shattered Gem Golem, a flawless diamond.
Text: The heart of a shattered Gem Golem, a flawless diamond.

TextEng: The heart of a shattered Gem Golem, a flawless emerald.
Text: The heart of a shattered Gem Golem, a flawless emerald.

TextEng: Wyvern blood, used for making inks, and occasionally for tempering metals.
Text: Wyvern blood, used for making inks, and occasionally for tempering metals.

TextEng: Since the war with the Devil Dragon, these blades are fairly common in Cormyr. They were manufactured in large numbers to equip the Purple Dragons, for it was only with Cold Iron that the ghazneths could be harmed.
Text: Since the war with the Devil Dragon, these blades are fairly common in Cormyr. They were manufactured in large numbers to equip the Purple Dragons, for it was only with Cold Iron that the ghazneths could be harmed.

TextEng:
A shield from a soldier of Cormyr, a Purple Dragon.

This item is considered stolen if you take it.
Text: A shield from a soldier of Cormyr, a Purple Dragon.\n\nThis item is considered stolen if you take it.

TextEng: A helmet usually worn by heavily armored soldiers of the Purple Dragons.
Text: A helmet usually worn by heavily armored soldiers of the Purple Dragons.

TextEng: A suit of scale mail belonging to the Purple Dragons.
Text: A suit of scale mail belonging to the Purple Dragons.

TextEng: Light armor belonging to the Purple Dragons.
Text: Light armor belonging to the Purple Dragons.

TextEng: This mail shirt is made from a dark alloy of metal but otherwise is unremarkable.
Text: This mail shirt is made from a dark alloy of metal but otherwise is unremarkable.

TextEng: These chain shirts were commonly worn by reavers in the early days of Cormyr. Dressed in their black mail shirts, the reavers silently attacked farming families, stealing not only their goods, but their women too, unless the farmers paid them off. The terms 'blackmail' and 'bereaved' soon became commonplace.
Text: These chain shirts were commonly worn by reavers in the early days of Cormyr. Dressed in their black mail shirts, the reavers silently attacked farming families, stealing not only their goods, but their women too, unless the farmers paid them off. The terms 'blackmail' and 'bereaved' soon became commonplace.

TextEng: This old, scarred beholder looks like he has faced down armies and laughed about it.
Text: This old, scarred beholder looks like he has faced down armies and laughed about it.

TextEng: Lord Antoine Baccha, Visier de Guise
Text: Lord Antoine Baccha, Visier de Guise

TextEng: This boorish noble seems to be both eccentric and ferocious at the same time.
Text: This boorish noble seems to be both eccentric and ferocious at the same time.

TextEng: This cloud giant is so old and withered that it is surprising she could possibly be alive, let alone command so much power.
Text: This cloud giant is so old and withered that it is surprising she could possibly be alive, let alone command so much power.

TextEng: Halaster is the master of Undermountain. He is reputed to be mad and very powerful.
Text: Halaster is the master of Undermountain. He is reputed to be mad and very powerful.

TextEng: This item belongs to Halaster Blackcloak. He carries it at all times.
Text: This item belongs to Halaster Blackcloak. He carries it at all times.

TextEng: The insect-like creature in front of you moves with a delicate step and a deliberate intelligence.
Text: The insect-like creature in front of you moves with a delicate step and a deliberate intelligence.

TextEng: Old and powerful, as any lich is bound to be, there is a palpable aura of energy surrounding the Lich King.
Text: Old and powerful, as any lich is bound to be, there is a palpable aura of energy surrounding the Lich King.

TextEng: Horses make useful beasts of burden, and the best of them also make good warhorses.
Text: Horses make useful beasts of burden, and the best of them also make good warhorses.

TextEng: Caladnei, the Royal Wizard, and the foremost sorceress of Cormyr. Tutored by Vangerdahast, she is a fine ally, or a formidable foe.
Text: Caladnei, the Royal Wizard, and the foremost sorceress of Cormyr. Tutored by Vangerdahast, she is a fine ally, or a formidable foe.

TextEng: This demon is surrounded by a dark malevolence that could drive a person mad if they stared too long.
Text: This demon is surrounded by a dark malevolence that could drive a person mad if they stared too long.

TextEng: A large, solid piece of granite lies on the ground.
Text: A large, solid piece of granite lies on the ground.

TextEng: A large piece of granite lies broken on the ground.
Text: A large piece of granite lies broken on the ground.

TextEng: Tourney Lances used for jousting are made of light, easily broken wood and designed to widen outwards to protect the wielder from splinters and shards. The head is made of wood or a weak metal, and is designed with a broad tip to lessen the force of impact, which decrease the chances of injury.
Text: Tourney Lances used for jousting are made of light, easily broken wood and designed to widen outwards to protect the wielder from splinters and shards. The head is made of wood or a weak metal, and is designed with a broad tip to lessen the force of impact, which decrease the chances of injury.

TextEng: Usually made of brass, the trumpet is a musical instrument that has seen many incarnations. It is often favored for pomp and pageantry, its players important heralds or messengers in royal courts. Trumpet players are often among the most heavily guarded members of a troop, as they are relied upon to relay instructions to other sections of the army.
Text: Usually made of brass, the trumpet is a musical instrument that has seen many incarnations. It is often favored for pomp and pageantry, its players important heralds or messengers in royal courts. Trumpet players are often among the most heavily guarded members of a troop, as they are relied upon to relay instructions to other sections of the army.

TextEng: The item attached to the end of this long thin piece of wood resembles the Moon. Now you have everything you've ever wanted.
Text: The item attached to the end of this long thin piece of wood resembles the Moon. Now you have everything you've ever wanted.

Base Critical Threat: x1

Text:
기본 피해량: 1d2
기본 치명타 위협: x1
기본 피해 유형: 둔기

TextEng:
(PRESTIGE CLASS)
The famous Purple Dragons of Cormyr are regarded across Faerun as exemplars of disciplined, skilled, loyal soldiers. Their reputation is deserved partly because of the heroic actions of their leaders, the Purple Dragon Knights. Purple Dragon Knights develop uncanny skills relating to coordinating and leading soldiers. Most are fighters, rangers or paladins, but a few bards, clerics, and rogues have been known to become Purple Dragon Knights. Sorcerers and Wizards tend to join the War Wizards, Cormyr's elite brigade of fighting spellcasters, while barbarians are too undisciplined, and druids and monks too "uncivilized" in Cormyr to enter this career.

- Hit Die: d10.
- Proficiencies: A purple dragon knight gains no additional proficiences.
- Skill Points: 2 + Int Modifier.

REQUIREMENTS:

Alignment: Non-Evil and Non-Chaotic.
Base Attack Bonus: +4.
Feats: Mounted Combat (requires Ride 1).
Skills: Spot 2 ranks, Intimidate 1 rank, Listen 2 ranks, Persuade 1 rank, Ride 2 ranks.

ABILITIES:

Level
1: Rallying Cry - +1 Attack Bonus to all allies within 60 feet, can be used three times a day.
    Heroic Shield - Able to defend a nearby ally, granting them a +4 armor class bonus for one round.
2: Inspire Courage - +2 saves vs. mind affecting, and +1 attack and damage, useable once a day.
3: Fear - As fear spell, useable once per day.
4: Inspire Courage - Can now be used twice a day.
   Oath of Wrath - +2 bonus to attack, damage, saves and skill vs. single enemy.
5: Final Stand - +2d10 HP to a number of allies equal to Purple Dragon Knight level + Charisma Bonus, once per day.
Text:
(상위 직업)
페이룬 전역에서 유명한 코어미어의 보라빛 용은 절제력, 기술, 충성심 면에서 병사의 본보기로 여겨집니다. 이들의 명성은 지도자인 보라빛 용기사의 영웅적인 행동의 영향도 일정부분 있습니다. 보라빛 용기사는 병사들을 조직하고 이끄는 기술이 초인적으로 발달되어 있습니다. 대부분은 전사, 순찰자, 성기사지만 몇몇 음유시인, 성직자, 도적도 보라빛 용기사가 된 것으로 알려졌습니다. 마법사와 요술사는 코어미어의 최정예 전투 주문시전자 여단인 전장 마법사에 가입하는 경향이 있고, 야만전사는 너무 절제력이 부족하고, 드루이드와 수도사는 코어미어에서 이 직업에 들어가기엔 너무 미개합니다.

요구사항:
- 가치관: 모든 악하지 않고 혼돈이 아닌 가치관
- 기본 공격 보너스(BAB): +4이상
- 기술: 발견 2등급, 위협 1등급, 듣기 2등급, 설득 1등급, 승마 2등급
- 재주: 기마 전투

일반 능력:
- 생명점 주사위(HD): d10
- 숙달: 추가적인 숙달 재주가 없습니다.
- 기술 점수: 2 + 지능 수정치

레벨
1: 원기회복의 외침 - 하루에 세번 강력한 외침을 사용해 모든 아군에게 +1점의 명중굴림 보너스와 20%의 이동 속도 보너스를 한 라운드간 제공합니다.
 영웅적 방패 - 아군을 지원하여 한 라운드간 방어도(AC)에 +4점의 피하기 보너스를 부여합니다.
2: 용기 불어넣기 - 하루에 한번 전투에서 군대를 고무시킬 수 있습니다. 효과를 받는 생명체들은 명중굴림과 피해굴림에 +1점의 보너스를 받고. 정신효과 주문에 대항해 +2점의 보너스를 받습니다. 4레벨에 하루에 추가로 한번더 사용 가능합니다.
3: 공포 - 주문 시전 능력
4: 분노의 서약 = 하루에 한번 하나의 적을 물리칠 것이라고 맹세할 수 있습니다. 그 상대에 대항해 명중굴림, 피해굴림, 내성굴림, 기술에 +2점의 보너스를 얻습니다.
5: 최후의 저항 - 하루에 한번 영웅적인 노력으로 군대를 고무시킬 수 있습니다. 효과 범위 내의 각 아군은 2d10점의 HP를 얻습니다.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class.
Prerequisite: Purple Dragon Knight level 1.
Specifics: Three times per day, a Purple Dragon Knight can utter a powerful shout that gives all allies a +1 bonus to attack and a 20% bonus to land speed for one round.
Use: Selected.
Text:
원기회복의 외침(Rallying cry)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 보라빛 용기사 레벨 1
세부 사항: 보라빛 용기사는 하루에 세번 강력한 외침을 사용해 모든 아군에게 +1점의 명중굴림 보너스와 20%의 이동 속도 보너스를 한 라운드간 제공합니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Purple Dragon Knight level 1.
Specifics: You may aid an ally, giving them a +4 bonus to their armour class for one round.
Use: Selected.
Text:
영웅적 방패(Heroic shield)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 보라빛 용기사 레벨 1
세부 사항: 아군을 지원하여 한 라운드간 방어도(AC)에 +4점의 피하기 보너스를 부여합니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class.
Prerequisite: Purple Dragon Knight level 3.
Specifics: Once per day, the Purple Dragon Knight may cast the Fear spell with a caster level equal to his character level.
Use: Selected.
Text:
공포(Fear)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 보라빛 용기사 레벨 3
세부 사항: 보라빛 용기사는 하루에 한번 캐릭터 레벨을 시전자 레벨로 취급한 공포 주문을 시전할 수 있습니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class.
Prerequisite: Purple Dragon Knight level 4.
Specifics: Once per day, the Purple Dragon Knight may swear to defeat a single opponent. He gains a +2 bonus to Attack, Damage, Saves, and Skills vs that opponent. This lasts for a number of rounds equal to twice his class level.
Use: Selected.
Text:
분노의 서약(Oath of wrath)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 보라빛 용기사 레벨 4
세부 사항: 보라빛 용기사는 하루에 한번 하나의 적을 물리칠 것이라고 맹세할 수 있습니다. 그 상대에 대항해 명중굴림, 피해굴림, 내성굴림, 기술에 +2점의 보너스를 얻습니다. 효과는 직업 레벨에 두배에 해당하는 라운드 동안 지속됩니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class.
Prerequisite: Purple Dragon Knight level 5.
Specifics: Once per day, the Purple Dragon Knight can inspire his troops to a heroic effort. Each ally in the area gains 2d10 hitpoints. This ability can affect a number of people equal to his Purple Dragon Knight level + Charisma modifier, and lasts for the same number of rounds.
Use: Selected.
Text:
최후의 저항(Final stand)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 보라빛 용기사 레벨 5
세부 사항: 보라빛 용기사는 하루에 한번 영웅적인 노력으로 군대를 고무시킬 수 있습니다. 효과 범위 내의 각 아군은 2d10점의 HP를 얻습니다. 이 능력은 [보라빛 용기사 직업 레벨 + 매력 수정치]라운드 동안 유지됩니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class.
Prerequisite: Purple Dragon Knight level 2.
Specifics: Once per day, the Purple Dragon Knight can inspire his troops in combat. All affected creatures gain a +1 bonus to Attack and Damage, and a +2 bonus against mind affecting spells. These bonuses last for 10 rounds.
Use: Selected.
Text:
용기 불어넣기(Inspire courage)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 보라빛 용기사 레벨 2
세부 사항: 보라빛 용기사는 하루에 한번 전투에서 군대를 고무시킬 수 있습니다. 효과를 받는 생명체들은 명중굴림과 피해굴림에 +1점의 보너스를 받고. 정신효과 주문에 대항해 +2점의 보너스를 받습니다. 이 보너스는 10라운드간 유지됩니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Ability: Dexterity.
Requires Training: No.
Classes: All.

The character has spent time training to use a horse in combat, and can perform actions unskilled people cannot.
Text:
연관 능력: 민첩
사용에 훈련 필요: 아니오
직업: 모두

전투에 말을 사용하는 훈련하는데 매진하여 비숙련자은 할 수 없는 행동을 할 수 있습니다.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General.
Prerequisite: Ride 1 rank.
Required for: Mounted Archery
Specifics: While mounted, once per round you will attempt a Ride check to increase your Armour Class by 1 point for every 5 of the check result.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
기마 전투(Mounted combat)
재주 유형: 일반
선결 조건: 승마 등급 1
다음 재주에 필요: 기마 궁술
세부 사항: 말을 타는 동안 승마 10등급 이후 승마 5등급 마다 방어도(AC)의 피하기 보너스를 1점씩 올릴 수 얻습니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General.
Prerequisite: Ride 1 rank, Mounted Combat.
Specifics: The attack penalty for using a bow while mounted is reduced from -4 to -2.
Use: Automatic.
Text:
기마 궁술(Mounted archery)
재주 유형: 일반
선결 조건: 승마 등급 1, 기마 전투
세부 사항: 말을 탄 상태에서 활을 사용할 때의 페널티가 -4에서 -2로 줄어듭니다.
사용: 자동

TextEng:
Materials are substances that are used to compose an item.  Materials, and the understanding of the use of them, form the basis of civilization.

Some materials must be refined from other raw materials.  Others have innate magical properties and are sought after by many.

When it comes to complex weapons and armor, the right materials can spell the difference between life or death.
Text:
Materials are substances that are used to compose an item. Materials, and the understanding of the use of them, form the basis of civilization.

Some materials must be refined from other raw materials. Others have innate magical properties and are sought after by many.

When it comes to complex weapons and armor, the right materials can spell the difference between life or death.

TextEng: No two tools are alike. Quality of workmanship and material increase the perfomance and longevity of an item. The time put in to manufacturing a quality product is returned ten-fold thereafter.
Text: No two tools are alike. Quality of workmanship and material increase the perfomance and longevity of an item. The time put in to manufacturing a quality product is returned ten-fold thereafter.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: None
Specifics: This series of actions enables players to interact with their mounts.
Use: Selected.

Individual Mount: Ride on the targetted mount, or command the targetted henchman to ride on a mount.
Individual Dismount: Targetted creature dismounts.
Text:
승마 행동(Mount actions)
재주 유형: 일반
선결 조건: 없음
세부 사항: 플레이어가 자신의 탈것에 대한 일련의 행동을 사용 가능합니다.
사용: 선택
올라타기: 선택한 대상에 올라탑니다. 또는 선택한 추종자가 탈것에 올라타도록 명령합니다.
내려오기: 대상 생명체가 탈것에서 내려옵니다.

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: None
Specifics: Use this feat on a horse that is in your party to mount it. Use this feat on a henchman to instruct him or her to mount the first available horse in the party.
Use: Selected.
Text:
올라타기(Individual mount)
재주 유형: 일반
선결 조건: 없음
세부 사항: 이 재주를 사용해 파티 내에 있는 말에 올라탈 수 있습니다. 이 재주를 추종자에게 사용하면 추종자가 파티 내의 올라탈 수 있는 말에 올라탑니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: General
Prerequisite: None
Specifics: Use this feat to dismount. Use this feat on a mounted henchman to instruct him or her to dismount.
Use: Selected.
Text:
내려오기(Individual dismount)
재주 유형: 일반
선결 조건: 없음
세부 사항: 이 재주를 사용하면 탈것에서 내려옵니다. 탈것에 올라탄 추종자에게 사용하면 추종자가 탈것에서 내려옵니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Type of Feat: Class
Prerequisite: Paladin
Specifics: Summons to the paladin a faithful, magical beast - a warhorse mount. The beast is more powerful as the paladin gets more powerful.

Note: Horses and the Ride skill are only used in the Premium Module "Neverwinter Nights - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr" and specific community made modules.

Use: Selected.
Text:
탈것 소환(Summon mount)
재주 유형: 직업
선결 조건: 성기사 레벨 5
세부 사항: 성기사가 하루에 한번 충직한 탈수 있는 마법 야수인 군마를 소환할 수 있습니다. 성기사가 강해질수록 군마 또한 강해집니다.
사용: 선택

TextEng:
Ability: Dexterity.
Requires Training: No.
Classes: All.

The character has spent time training to use a horse in combat, and can perform actions unskilled people cannot.

Note: Horses and the Ride skill are only used in the Premium Module "Neverwinter Nights - Wyvern Crown of Cormyr" and specific community made modules.
Text:
연관 능력: 민첩
사용에 훈련 필요: 아니오
직업: 모두

전투에 말을 사용하는 훈련하는데 매진하여 비숙련자은 할 수 없는 행동을 할 수 있습니다.

TextEng: In the excitement of combat, the Nightmare snorts and neighs with rage. This fills the surrounding area with hot sulfurous smoke that conceals the Nightmare.
Text: In the excitement of combat, the Nightmare snorts and neighs with rage. This fills the surrounding area with hot sulfurous smoke that conceals the Nightmare.

The feat is implemented by editing the x3_pl_tool01 script in the toolset and then giving the feat to a player. This can be done by adding a item property bonus feat to a creature skin that has been previously equipped by the player through scripting.
Use: Selected.
Text:
Type of Feat: Instant Custom
Prerequisite: None
Specifics: This instant feat can be given to players to enable a behavior you desire. The feat does nothing unless implemented in a community made module. The feat is implemented by editing the x3_pl_tool01 script in the toolset and then giving the feat to a player. This can be done by adding a item property bonus feat to a creature skin that has been previously equipped by the player through scripting.
Use: Selected.

TextEng: There are many dangers lurking, and unwary travelers can find themselves accosted or even killed by resting in unsecured surroundings. By using a Portable Encampment (tm) by AdventureCo, they can rest easy in the peace and security provided by an encampment designed and built by the lowest bidder.
Text: There are many dangers lurking, and unwary travelers can find themselves accosted or even killed by resting in unsecured surroundings. By using a Portable Encampment (tm) by AdventureCo, they can rest easy in the peace and security provided by an encampment designed and built by the lowest bidder.

TextEng: You cannot mount that mount while it is being possessed by a DM.
Text: DM이 조종중인 탈 것은 탈 수 없습니다.

TextEng: Please run Neverwinter Nights through the Beamdog Client to store your CD Key. This must be done once to unlock the full game.
Text: Please run Neverwinter Nights through the Beamdog Client to store your CD Key. This must be done once to unlock the full game.

TextEng: Attempting To Recover Your Multiplayer CD Key.
Text: Attempting To Recover Your Multiplayer CD Key.\n

TextEng:
Error MS0020.  You do not have a CD key that you can use in multiplayer.

You should ask customer support at the digital store where you purchased the game for information on how to get your multiplayer-enabled CD key.
Text: Error MS0020. You do not have a CD key that you can use in multiplayer.\n\nYou should ask customer support at the digital store where you purchased the game for information on how to get your multiplayer-enabled CD key.

TextEng: Error MS0021.  There has been an IO Failure while attempting to get your multiplayer CD key.  Please wait five minutes, and try again.

Text: Error MS0022. There has been an IO Failure while attempting to get your multiplayer CD key. Please reconnect to Steam, and try again.
